+ "<t0>S</t0>" : This will force <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to save your project.
+ "<t0>S</t0>"：它会要求<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>保存你的工程。
+ "<t0>T</t0>" : This will open the <b1>Goto Window</b1> which enables you to quickly search for and go to any resource in your game.
+ "<t0>T</t0>"：它会打开<b1>前往（Goto）窗口</b1>来允许你快速地搜索并前往游戏中的任意资源。
+ "<t0>Y</t0>" : This will redo a previous action that was undone and works in most of the editors.
+ "<t0>Y</t0>"：它可以在绝大多数编辑器中重做（Redo）之前被撤销的变动。
+ "<t0>Z</t0>" : This will undo the previous action and works in most of the editors.
+ "<t0>Z</t0>" ：它可以在绝大多数编辑器中撤销（Undo）之前的动作。
+ <i0>: This will open the <b1>Workspace Overview</b1> window which can be used to navigate quickly between items that are open in the different workspaces.
+ <i0>：它能打开<b1>工作区概览（Workspace Overview）</b1>窗口，其可以用于在不同工作区内的项之间快速导航。

: This can be used to collapse or expand all the different docked windows in the IDE.
：它能够折叠或展开IDE中所有层叠窗口。
<b0>"My Projects" Location</b0>: The location qhere <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will initially create new projects.
<b0>“我的工程”文件夹位置（"My Projects" Location）</b0><i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>创建新工程的初始位置。
<b0>% when application is not in focus</b0>: The base power consumption when <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> is not in focus (regardless of the power supply).
<b0>% 在应用程序失去焦点时（% when application is not in focus）</b0>：当<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>失去焦点时的基本功耗（该情况下无视电源类型）。
<b0>% when on AC power</b0>: The base power consumption when connected to a power input.
<b0>% 在使用交流电源时（% when on AC power）</b0>：当连接输入电源时的基本功耗。
<b0>% when on battery power</b0>: The base power consumption when using battery to power the machine.
<b0>% 在使用电池电源时（% when on battery power）</b0>：当使用机器电池时的基本功耗。
<b0>About</b0> - Opens the "about <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>" window where you can get version information on the product (essential for reporting any bugs or issues).
<b0>关于（About）</b0> - 打开“关于<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>”窗口，你可以在这里面获取到产品的版本信息（在上报Bug和问题时这很有用）。
<b0>Add Event</b0> - Add a new event from the event list.
<b0>添加事件</b0> - 从事件列表中添加新事件。

<b0>Add default layers when creating a new room</b0> - When you create any new room resource, <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will generate a couple of "base" layers for you - a background layer and an instance layer.
<b0>创建新房间时添加默认的层（Add default layers when creating a new room）</b0> - 当你创建任意一个房间资源，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>将为你生成两个“基础”的层， - 一个背景层和一个实例层。
<b0>Allow Empty Tabs To Close Via Shortcut</b0>: You can close any open Tabs using the keyboard shortcut <i1> + <b2><t3>W</t3></b2>, but if you disable this option that shortcut will no longer work.
<b0>允许通过快捷键关闭空标签（Allow Empty Tabs To Close Via Shortcut）</b0>：你可以使用键盘快捷键<i1> + <b2><t3>W</t3></b2>关闭任意被打开的标签，但如果禁用该选项，则该快捷键将不再生效。
<b0>Allow workspace chains to overlap</b0>: When enabled this option will permit workspace chains to cross and overlap.
<b0>允许工作区的连接线交叉（Allow workspace chains to overlap）</b0>：启用该选项后将允许工作区内的连接线彼此交叉重叠。

<b0>Always Open New Resources Dropped Into IDE</b0>: Certain resources (like sprites or sounds) can be dragged onto the main Workspace in the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE and will be detected and added as a new resource in the Resource Tree.
<b0>总是打开被拖拽到IDE中的新资源（Always Open New Resources Dropped Into IDE）</b0>：某些资源（像精灵（Sprites）或声音（Sounds））是可以被拖拽到<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>主工作区中的，并且它能够被检测到并被添加到资源树中作为一个新资源。
<b0>Anchor Point Height</b0> - Set the height of the anchor points, in pixels.
<b0>锚点高度（Anchor Point Height）</b0> - 设置锚点高度，以像素为单位。
<b0>Anchor Point Width</b0> - Set the width of the anchor points, in pixels.
<b0>锚点的宽度（Anchor Point Width）</b0> - 设置锚点的宽度，以像素为单位。
<b0>Anti-Aliasing Mode</b0>: Here you can set the anti-aliasing mode for the output windows font rendering.
<b0>抗锯齿模式（Anti-Aliasing Mode）</b0>：在此处你可以设置输出窗口字体渲染的抗锯齿模式。
<b0>Asset Cache</b0>: The location for saving the asset cache for each project.
<b0>资源缓存（Asset Cache）</b0>：该位置用于存储每个工程的资源缓存。
<b0>音频组（Audio Groups）</b0> - 查看<a1>音频组</a1>窗口
<b0>Auto Delete Temp Folder</b0>: Checking this will force <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to automatically delete the Temp folder that it creates per project for compiling etc...
<b0>自动删除临时文件夹（Auto Delete Temp Folder）</b0>：勾选此项将会强制<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>自动删除每次编译工程等时候产生的临时文件夹。
<b0>Automatically Reload Changed Files</b0>: If this is checked then the IDE will automatically scan and check
<b0>自动重新载入变动文件（Automatically Reload Changed Files）</b0>：如果该选项被勾选，则IDE会自动扫描并检查
<b0>Automatically pop up Syntax Errors when an error occurs</b0>: Enable or disable syntax error notification when compiling.
<b0>当错误发生时自动弹出语法错误（Automatically pop up Syntax Errors when an error occurs）</b0>：编译时启用或禁用语法错误通知。
<b0>Background Image</b0>: This is the image file that will be used as the background for the different Workspaces.
<b0>背景图（Background Image）</b0>：该选项是被用于各个工作区下作为背景的图像文件。

<b0>Background colour in editor</b0>: While editing a sprite frame the image may be scaled in or out or may not fit the whole drawing in window, in which case a background colour will be shown which you can set here.
<b0>编辑器的背景色（Background colour in editor）</b0>：当编辑精灵帧的时候，图像可能会被放大或缩小，并且可能不会适应窗口中的整个绘制区域，在这种情况下，就会显示你所设置的背景色。
<b0>Certificate File</b0>: This section is where you specify the <t1>*.pem</t1> file that the Marketplace uses for certification of assets.
<b0>证书文件（Certificate File）</b0>：这个部分是你所指定给市场用于资源认证的<t1>*.pem</t1>文件。
<b0>Certificate Password</b0>: Here you must give a unique password for the certificate file to be created.
<b0>证书密码（Certificate Password）</b0>：在这里，你必须为即将创建的证书设置一个独立的密码。
<b0>Certificate Password</b0>: Here you must input the certificate password for the file selected above.
<b0>证书密码（Certificate Password）</b0>：在此处你必须输入上面所选文件的认证密码。
<b0>Check</b0>: Once you have filled in the above fields you should click this button to ensure that the password and file selection are correct and work together.
<b0>检查（Check）</b0>：一旦你已经填入了上述字段，你应该点击这个按钮来确保密码和所选文件是否正确以及是否能够一起运作。
<b0>Clean</b0> - <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> keeps a cache of files to help speed up compile time when testing.
<b0>清除</b0> - 测试时<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 会保存缓存文件以帮助加速编译。

<b0>Clear output window on compile</b0>: By default the compiler window will clear all previous messages from the compile output window at the start of each build, however un-checking this will maintain previous compiler logs.
<b0>编译时清空输出窗口（Clear output window on compile）</b0>：默认地，编译窗口会在每次开始构建的时候清空窗口，而解除此项会保留之前的编译日志。
<b0>Code Completion Delay (ms)</b0> - The delay time (in milliseconds)
<b0>代码补全延迟（Code Completion Delay (ms)）</b0> - 延迟的时间（毫秒）
<b0>Colour Applied To Active Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are active.
<b0>激活的锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Active Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制激活的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Active Invalid Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are active but invalid.
<b0>活跃却无效的锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Active Invalid Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制激活但是无效的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To An Invalid Path</b0> - The colour to be used to highlight a path that is not valid.
<b0>用于一个无效路径的颜色（Colour Applied To An Invalid Path）</b0> - 用于高亮无效路径的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points.
<b0>锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制路径锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Highlighted Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points that have been highlighted (selected).
<b0>高亮锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Highlighted Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制高亮的锚点的颜色（选中）。
<b0>Colour Applied To Highlighted Path Segments</b0> - The colour to be used to highlight any selected path segments.
<b0>应用于高亮路径节点的颜色（Colour Applied To Highlighted Path Segments）</b0> - 用于高亮任何选中的路径节点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Invalid Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points.
<b0>无效锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Invalid Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制无效路径锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Invalid Highlighted Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are highlighted but invalid.
<b0>应用于无效的高亮锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Invalid Highlighted Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制高亮但却是无效的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To The Path</b0> - The colour to be used to show the path as you edit it.
<b0>应用到路径的颜色（Colour Applied To The Path）</b0> - 编辑时，显示路径用的颜色。
<b0>Colour coding/code completion for obsolete functions</b0>: This will highlight any section of code that is obsolete.
<b0>为过时函数使用颜色编码和代码补全</b0>：这将突出显示代码中的过时函数。
<b0>Colour of control lines</b0> - Set the colour for the lines linking the control points to the nodes.
<b0>控制线颜色（Colour of control lines）</b0> - 设置控制点与节点的连接线颜色。
<b0>Colour of control points</b0> - Set the colour for each of the control point "handles" on a node.
<b0>控制点颜色（Colour of control points）</b0> - 设置一个样条曲线上的“手柄调控点”颜色。
<b0>Colour of nodes</b0> - Set the colour for the different nodes on the spline/arc.
<b0>节点颜色（Colour of nodes）</b0> - 设置样条/弧线上各个路径节点的颜色。
<b0>Colour of selected nodes</b0> - Set the colour to be used for any selecetd nodes on the spline/arc.
<b0>选中的节点颜色（Colour of selected nodes）</b0> - 设置样条/弧线上所有被选中的节点的颜色。
<b0>Colour</b0>: The default colour for the text being written to the window.
<b0>颜色（Colour）</b0>：文本被写入该窗口所使用的默认颜色。

<b0>Control key must be held down for mouse wheel zoom</b0>: When this is checked all editors (and the main workspace) will have zoom enabled with <i1> + the mouse wheel <i2>, while un-checking it will enable zoom with <i3>only</i3> the mouse wheel <i4>.
<b0>必须按下Ctrl键来进行滚轮缩放（Control key must be held down for mouse wheel zoom）</b0>：当勾选此项时，所有编辑器以及工作区都必须使用<i1>+鼠标滚轮<i2>才能进行缩放，而解除此项则<i3>只</i3>需要鼠标滚轮<i4>就能进行缩放了。
<b0>Convert To Drag and Drop / Code</b0> - Object events will be created using the method chosen when you created the project, either using code or using Drag and Drop actions.
<b0>转换为拖放/代码</b0> - 使用代码或使用拖放操作创建项目时使用的方法创建对象事件。
<b0>Create Executable</b0> - This will compile the current project and create an executable file (or files) for the target platform.
<b0>创建可执行文件（Create Executable）</b0> - 这将为目标平台编译当前项目并创建可执行文件。
<b0>Create Package</b0> - With this option you can open the <b1>Create Package Wizard</b1> to create a new asset package or tutorial for the Marketplace.
<b0>创建资源报（Create Package）</b0> - 使用该选项你可以打开<b1>资源包创建向导（Create Package Wizard）</b1>来为市场创建一个新的资源包或教程。
<b0>Cut / Copy / Paste Events</b0> - Cut, copy or paste the selected event.
<b0>剪切/复制/粘贴事件</b0> - 剪切，复制或粘贴所选事件。
<b0>DPI Override</b0>: This option lets you override the default DPI setting with your own.
<b0>DPI改写（DPI Override）</b0>：该选项允许用你自己的分辨率设定去覆盖默认分辨率设定。
<b0>Debug</b0> - Run your current project for testing with the debugger so that you can see detailed performance information and debug any errors or issues you may have.
<b0>调试</b0> - 使用调试器调试运行你当前的项目，以便你可以看到详细的性能信息，并且调试任何错误及可能的问题。
<b0>Default Animation Mode For New Sprites</b0>: This option permits you to set the default animation mode for sprites in the sprite editor.
<b0>新的精灵的默认动画模式（Default Animation Mode For New Sprites）</b0>：此选项允许你在精灵编辑器中设置默认的动画模式。
<b0>Default Audio Device</b0>: Here you can choose the default audio device for the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE to use.
<b0>默认音频设备（Default Audio Device）</b0>：在此处你可以选择<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE所使用的默认音频设备
<b0>Default For Exit Confirmation</b0>: This option permits you to set whether a confirmation message should be shown when you exit <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>退出确认时默认（Default For Exit Confirmation）</b0>：该选项允许你设置在退出<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>时是否显示确认信息。

<b0>Default For File Deletion</b0>: The default setting here is to show a message asking if you are sure you want to delete, but you can set this to "OK" so that all deletions are completed without this message as if you'd clicked okay already.
<b0>文件删除时默认进行（Default For File Deletion）</b0>：此处的默认选项是显示消息并询问你是否希望进行删除，但如果你将这项置为“OK”，那么删除时不会显示这个消息，就好像你已经点过确认按钮一样。
<b0>Default For Proxy Deletion</b0>: As above, this controls the message you are shown on deletion of any proxy files.
<b0>代理文件删除时默认进行（Default For Proxy Deletion）</b0>：同上，该项控制在删除代理文件时是否显示消息。

<b0>Default Loop Mode</b0>: The loop button in the Image Editor can be set to function in two different modes: either play once, where the animation will stop when it gets to the last frame, loop from the start, where the animation will go back to the first frame when it finishes, or ping pong, where the animation will go up through the images to the end and then back down through them again to the beginning.

<b0>默认循环模式（Default Loop Mode）</b0>：图像编辑器中的循环按钮可以设置#?两种#?功能模式：一种是单次播放（Play Once），这种情况下动画会在到达最后一帧时停止；另一个是从起点开始循环（Loop from the start），这种情况下动画会在结束后回到起点并继续播放；还有一个是往返播放（Ping pong），这种情况下动画会从头播放到尾再倒过来播放一遍回到开始。
<b0>Default Origin For New Sprites</b0>: This option permits you to set the default origin position for any new sprite resources that you create.
<b0>新的精灵的默认原点（Default Origin For New Sprites）</b0>：这个选项允许你为任何新创建的精灵设置默认的原点位置。

<b0>Default choice for resetting the project layout</b0>: When you select to reset the project layout (from the <a1>Layouts Menu</a1>) you will, by default, be shown a warning message about how this will close any open resource windows.
<b0>重置工程布局的默认选择（Default choice for resetting the project layout）</b0>当你（从<a1>布局菜单（Layouts Menu）</a1>）选择重置工程布局时，默认地会显示一个警告消息告诉你该操作将会关闭所有打开的资源窗口。

<b0>Default for Drag and Drop conversion to code</b0>: You can use the right mouse button <i1> within the Drag and Drop workspace to select the option to turn all Drag and Drop for that event into GML code.
<b0>默认设置DnD转换为代码（Default for Drag and Drop conversion to code）</b0>：你可以在DnD（ Drag and Drop）工作区使用鼠标右键 <i1>选择选项将所有的DnD事件转换为GML代码。
<b0>Default for automatically updating layer depths</b0> - When you change layer depths a message is shown to warn you that doing this will also automatically update all the other layer depths.
<b0>默认自动更新层深度（Default for automatically updating layer depths）</b0> - 当你更改层深度时，将会显示一条消息，警告你这样做也将会自动更新其它所有层的深认。

<b0>Default for closing non-empty workspace tab using keyboard shortcut</b0>: The keyboard shortcut mentioned above can be used to close any open tab, but sometimes you may accidentally close an empty tab that you require.
<b0>使用快捷键关闭非空工作区标签页时的默认处理（Default for closing non-empty workspace tab using keyboard shortcut）</b0>：前面所说的的键盘快捷键可以用来关闭任何打开的标签页，但有时候你可能会不小心关掉你所需要的标签页。
<b0>Default for committing changes on tool change</b0> - When you change draw tools after editing a frame, by default a message shows to ask if you want to commit the changes made.
<b0>工具更改时提交修改的默认处理（Default for committing changes on tool change）</b0> - 当你在（使用样条工具等）编辑一帧之后更改绘制工具，默认地会显示一个消息去询问你是否要提交当前的变动。
<b0>Default for deleting frames</b0> - When you delete a frame by default a message shows to ask if you are sure you want to do this.
<b0>删除帧时默认处理（Default for deleting frames）</b0> - 当你删除一个帧的时候，会默认地显示一个消息询问你是否确定要做这件事。

<b0>Default for opening multiple resources</b0>: As mentioned above in the general Resource Tree preferences, when you open multiple resources at once from the resource tree, you can get a warning if the number exceeds the number specified.
<b0>打开多个资源的默认设置（Default for opening multiple resources）</b0>：就如上面提到的，在资源树的基本偏好设置中，同时打开的超过指定的数目你会获得一个警告。
<b0>Default for parent room item deletion</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you delete an item that is part of a parent room (and so present in all child rooms).
<b0>默认为删除父房间项目（Default for parent room item deletion）</b0> - 在这里你可以选择当你删除的项目是父房间的一部分时（会出现在所有的子房间内）会发生什么。
<b0>Default for parent room layer deletion</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you delete a layer that is part of a parent room (and so present in all child rooms).
<b0>默认删除父房间层（Default for parent room layer deletion）</b0> - 在这里你可选择当你删除一个层，而它是一个父房间的一部分时（因此存在于所有的子房间），会发生什么。

<b0>Default for replacing images on strip import</b0> - When you select <i1>Import Strip</i1> from the <i2>Image</i2> drop down menu, you will get a message warning you that you will be overwriting any images already in the sprite resource, with the option to continue or not.
<b0>在导入长带图时候替换图像的默认处理（Default for replacing images on strip import）</b0> - 当你在<i2>图像（Image）</i2>下拉菜单中选择<i1>导入长带图（Import Strip）</i1>时，你会得到一个消息警告你这样会覆盖精灵资源中现存的所有图像，并提供给你两个选项选择继续进行还是不继续。
<b0>Default for resource deletion</b0>: When you delete a resource from the resource tree you normally get a warning asking if you are sure you want to proceed.
<b0>删除资源的默认设置（Default for resource deletion）</b0>：当你删除资源树的一个资源，通常你会得到一个警告，询问你是否想要继续。
<b0>Default for restarting a running build</b0>: When you restart a build and another previous one is still running, you will be asked whether you want to stop the current build first.
<b0>重新运行生成项时的默认处理（Default for restarting a running build）</b0>：当你在上一个生成版本还在运行的时候你重新开始生成时，你会被询问是否想要先中止当前的生成版本。
<b0>Default height of a new room</b0>: Sets the initial height that will be selected as the default for a new room.
<b0>新房间的默认高度（Default height of a new room）</b0>：设置初始高度也将作为新创建房间的默认高度。

<b0>Default message for converting Drag and Drop to GML</b0>: When you convert a Drag and Drop event or script into GML code, you will by default get a message warning you about what you are about to do and asking if you want to continue.
<b0>转换拖拽按钮为GML时默认该消息（Default message for converting Drag and Drop to GML）</b0>：当你酱拖拽按钮事件或脚本转换为GML代码时，默认地你会得到一个关于你要做什么并且询问你是否继续的警告消息。
<b0>Default size of toolbox Action thumbnails</b0>: This setting will be used to define the default size for all action icons in the toolbox (default 32px).
<b0>工具箱中动作按钮缩略图的默认尺寸（Default size of toolbox Action thumbnails）</b0>：这个设置用于定义工具箱中所有动作图标的默认大小。（默认为32像素）
<b0>Default width of a new room</b0>: Sets the initial width that will be selected as the default for a new room.
<b0>新房间的默认宽度（Default width of a new room）</b0>：设置初始的宽度作为新房间默认宽度。
<b0>Delete Asset Cache On Quit</b0>: If this is checked then the asset compiler cache folder will be removed when you quit <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>退出时删除资源缓存（Delete Asset Cache On Quit）</b0>：如果勾选此项，则在你退出<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>时候删除资源编译器缓存。.
<b0>Delete Asset Cache</b0>: Clicking this button will delete the compiler asset cache for the project.
<b0>删除资源缓存（Delete Asset Cache）</b0>：点击该按钮将会删除该工程的资源缓存。
<b0>删除事件</b0> - 删除事件（或事件）。
<b0>Delete Temp Folder</b0>: Clicking this button will delete the temp folder for the project.
<b0>删除临时文件夹（Delete Temp Folder）</b0>：点击该按钮将会删除该工程的临时文件夹。

<b0>Disable IDE Transitions</b0>: The <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE has a number of animated transitions for things like opening windows etc... however they are not to everyone's taste and you may experience a performance boost if they are disabled on older or underpowered machines if they are disabled.
<b0>禁用IDE切换效果（Disable IDE Transitions）</b0>：<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的IDE有一些动画切换效果。例如打开窗口等……然而这些效果并不是所有人的菜并且如果在老式或者低功耗机器上禁用这些效果你也可能得到性能的提升。
<b0>Dismiss dragging resources into a locked or invisible layer error</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you drag a resource onto a layer that has been locked or is flagged as invisible.
<b0>忽略拖拽资源到锁定或不可见层的错误（Dismiss dragging resources into a locked or invisible layer error）</b0> - 在这里你可以选择当你拖拽一个资源到房间层而这个层已经锁定或者不可见时会发生什么。

<b0>Dismiss dragging resources with multiple or no selected layers</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you drag a resource onto the room editor when you have selected multiple layers in the layer editor (or have not selected any layer at all).
<b0>忽略拖拽资源到多层或未选中层的错误（Dismiss dragging resources with multiple or no selected layers）</b0> - 在这里你可以选择当你拖拽一个资源到房间编辑器中，此时选中了多个层或者没有选中任何层时会发生什么。

<b0>Dismiss group selected warning</b0> - If you select multiple layers in the layer editor and then try to draw or edit then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it is not possible.
<b0>忽略选定组警告（Dismiss group selected warning）</b0> - 当你在图层编辑器中选择多个涂层并开始绘制或编辑的时候，编辑器会弹出一个消息告诉你这样不可以。

<b0>Dismiss invalid resource being dragged into room error</b0> - If you try to add a resource to a layer that is not designated as being for that resource type (like adding a sprite to a path layer), then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it can't be done.
<b0>忽略无效资源拖拽到房间的错误（Dismiss invalid resource being dragged into room error）</b0> - 如果你尝试添加一个资源到一个层，但是那个层不是为那个资源类型设计的（如果添加一个精灵到路径层），那么默认你将看到一条消息，通知你不能这样做。
<b0>Dismiss item locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete an item it happens to be locked, you will be shown a message by default.
<b0>解除项目锁定警告（Dismiss item locked warning）</b0> - 如果你尝试删除一条项目，而它碰巧被锁定，默认，你将看到一条消息。

<b0>Dismiss item's owner layer locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete an item on a layer and the layer happens to be locked (even if the item is not), then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it can't be done.
<b0>解除项目所属层的锁定的警告（Dismiss item's owner layer locked warning）</b0> - 如果你删除层中的一个项目，碰巧层被锁定了（即使该项目没有被锁定），然后默认你将看到一条消息，通知你不能这样做。
<b0>Dismiss layer is locked warning</b0> - If you try to edit a locked layer you'll get a message by default informing you that you can't do this.
<b0>忽略图层锁定警告（Dismiss layer is locked warning）</b0> - 如果你在尝试去编辑一个锁定的图层，那么你会默认地得到一个消息告诉你你无法这样做。
<b0>Dismiss layer locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete a layer in the room and it happens to be locked, you will be shown a message by default.
<b0>解除层锁定警告（Dismiss layer locked warning）</b0> - 如果你尝试删除一房间层，而它碰巧被锁定，默认情况你将看到一条消息。
<b0>Display Grid</b0> - If this is checked then the Image Editor will open with the image grid on.
<b0>显示网格（Display Grid）</b0> - 勾选此项则图像编辑器会自动带上网格地打开图像。
<b0>Display Grid</b0> - This option will toggle on or off the room grid when you first open a room.
<b0>显示网格（Display Grid）</b0> - 首次打开一个房间，这个选项将切换房间网格的显示。

<b0>Display argument descriptions in status bar</b0>: If this is checked then any descriptions you have given your custom scripts using the JSDoc notation will be shown in the status bar at the bottom of the editor window.
<b0>在状态栏中显示参数描述（Display argument descriptions in status bar）</b0>：勾选该选项之后你在自定义脚本中使用JSDoc标记给出的描述都会在编辑器窗口底部的状态栏中显示出来。

<b0>Display argument types in status bar</b0>: This option relates to when you are using your own custom scripts and have used JSDoc notation to identify the different arguments, etc... (see <a1>here</a1> for more information).
<b0>在状态栏中显示参数类型（Display argument types in status bar）</b0>：该选项关系到在你使用你自己的被JSDoc标注过的自定义脚本（Script）时是否显示各种参数等……（详情请见<a1>这里</a1>）

<b0>Distance tab must be dragged to un-maximise the desktop</b0>: When you drag a workspace tab away from its default position within the IDE, if there is only one workspace active at that time then the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> window will un-maximise and move with the mouse (if you have more than one workspace active a new instance of the IDE will be created to hold the workspace).

<b0>还原窗口所需要拖拽标签页的距离（Distance tab must be dragged to un-maximise the desktop）</b0>：当你将一个工作区标签从IDE中的默认位置拖拽出来时，如果与此同时只有一个活动工作区，则<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的窗口会被还原并跟随鼠标移动（如果你有多个活动工作区，则会创建一个新的IDE实例窗口来承载这个工作区）。
<b0>Document line limit</b0>: Set the maximum number of lines for any given editor document.
<b0>文档行限制</b0>：设置任意给定的编辑器文档的行数的最大数目。

<b0>Draw thin selection outline</b0>: If this is checked then the outline for selections will be an absolute 1px in width, regardless of the scale of the image, while having it un-checked will make the selection outline a relative 1px in width and scale with the image.
<b0>绘制细的选区边框（Draw thin selection outline）</b0>：如果你勾选此项，则选区的边框将会是无视图像缩放的绝对的1像素宽，而解除此选项则使得边框为相对于图像缩放的1像素宽。
<b0>重复事件</b0> - 复制所选事件。
<b0>Email to commit as</b0>: The email that is associated with this Git identity.
<b0>用于提交的邮箱（Email to commit as）</b0>：与此Git身份关联的邮箱。
<b0>Enable Mask Overlay For Point Insertion</b0> - Enable or disable the mask overlay option.
<b0>为点插入启用蒙版覆盖（Enable Mask Overlay For Point Insertion）</b0> - 启用或禁用蒙版覆盖选项。
<b0>Enable adding brackets () to functions</b0>: Enable or disable the automatic addition of brackets () when you use the autocomplete.
<b0>启用函数添加括号()</b0>：当使用自动补全时启用或者禁用自动添加括号()。
<b0>Enable code completion</b0>: Enable or disable the code completion window.
<b0>启用代码补全</b0>：启用或者禁用代码补全窗口。
<b0>Enable colour coding</b0>: Enable or disable colour coding for the editor.
<b0>允许颜色编码</b0>：启用或禁用编辑器的颜色编码。
<b0>退出（Exit）</b0> - 退出 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 到桌面。
<b0>Export Project</b0> - This will export the project as a single <t1>*.yyz</t1> file.
<b0>导出项目（Export Project）</b0> - 该选项将会把项目导出为一个单独的<t1>*.yyz</t1>文件。
<b0>Font Name</b0>: The name of the font to use (available fonts will depend on those installed on your system).
<b0>字体名称（Font Name）</b0>：所使用的字体名称（所可用的字体取决于安装在你系统上的字体）。
<b0>Gadget</b0> - Gadget shortcuts are very specific and will only work when using a single gadget (the colour picker, for example).
<b0>部件</b0> - 部件快捷键是仅针对于单独一个控件部件（例如，取色器）生效的快捷键
<b0>Generate Project Images</b0> - Opens the <a1>Generate Project Images</a1> window.
<b0>生成项目图（Generate Project Images）</b0> - 打开<a1>生成项目图</a1>窗口。
<b0>Global</b0> - Global shortcuts are those that work no matter where you are in the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE, unless your focus is on a specific window or gadget which overrides it.
<b0>全局</b0> - 全局快捷键是那些你在<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE中无论什么位置都能生效的快捷键，除非你选择了一个覆盖了它的某个窗口或部件.
<b0>Go to the Marketplace</b0> - Open the Marketplace window where you can browse for assets.
<b0>前往市场（Go to the Marketplace）</b0> - 打开市场窗口，在这个窗口里你可以浏览资源。
<b0>Greyscale</b0> - Desaturate the image by a determined amount.
<b0>灰阶（Greyscale）</b0> - Desaturate the image by a determined amount.
<b0>Highlight Colour For Inherited Tiles</b0>: Sets the highlight colour for a tile that has been inherited from a parent room.
<b0>继承图块的高亮颜色（Highlight Colour For Inherited Tiles）</b0>：对于已经继承自一个父房间的图块，设置它的高亮颜色。

<b0>Highlight symbol pairs</b0>: This will highlight any pair of symbols in a section of code when one symbol is selected, for example, if you select the first bracket on a code block "{" the corresponding bracket "}" will be highlighted too.
<b0>高亮显示成对符号</b0>：当选中一个符号时，这将突出显示任何成对的符号，比如，如果你选中一个代码块的第一个括号“{”，对应的括号“}”也会高亮。
<b0>Highlight words which match selection</b0>: This will lightly highlight any section of code that is duplicated elsewhere.
<b0>高亮选区文字</b0>：这将稍微高亮选中的代码。
<b0>Horizontal pixel spacing</b0> - This value sets the spacing for the horizontal lines of the image grid.
<b0>水平像素间隔（Horizontal Pixel Spacing）</b0> - 该值设置图像编辑器网格的水平线间距。
<b0>Horizontal pixel spacing</b0> - This will set the horizontal space for gird cells of the room grid in pixels.
<b0>水平像素间距（Horizontal pixel spacing）</b0> - 这将以像素为单位设置房间网格的单元格水平间距。
<b0>How Many Segments Should Render Chains Have?</b0>: Here you can set the maximum number of segments for render chains.
<b0>连接线需要渲染成多少段？（How Many Segments Should Render Chains Have?）</b0>：此处你可以设置渲染连接线所使用的最大段数。
<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> Exporting YYZ projects is <b1>not</b1> available with the Trial Licence of the product.
<b0>重要！</b0> 导出YYZ项目在试用版（Trial License）产品中<b1>不</b1>可用。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> If the global variable you are getting does not exist then the function will return the keyword <t1>undefined</t1> and you may get errors that will stop the game from functioning, so if in doubt use the function <a2><t3>variable_global_exists</t3></a2> first.
<b0>重要！</b0>如果你要取得的全局变量并不存在，那么该函数将会返回关键字<t1>undefined</t1>并且你可能会得到错误，阻止游戏的运转，因此如果你不够确定的话请先使用<a2><t3>variable_global_exists</t3></a2>函数。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> If you have been using a Trial Licence for <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> and then buy one of the other licences (Desktop, Mobile, UWP, Web or Console) then you <b2>may</b2> need to log out of the IDE and then restart <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> and log back in again to make sure that the new licence is applied correctly (although this should happen automatically).
<b0>重要！</b0> 如果你已经使用一个<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的试用版许可证，然后买了一个其它许可证中的一个（桌面版、移动版、UWP、网页版或者控制台），然后你<b2>可能</b2>需要登出IDE，接着重启<i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3>之后再次登录以确保新的许可证正确应用（尽管这应该会自动生效）。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> If you have been using a Trial Licence for <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> and then buy one of the other licences (Desktop, Mobile, UWP, Web or Console) then you will <b2>may</b2> to log out of the IDE and then restart <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> and log back in again to make sure that the new licence is applied correctly (although this should happen automatically).
<b0>重要！</b0> 如果你已经在使用一个 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的试用版许可证，然后买一个其它的许可证（桌面版、移动版、UWP、网页版或者控制台），然后你<b2>可能</b2> 需要登出IDE，接着重启<i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3>，之后再次登录以确保新的许可证正确应用（尽管这应该会自动生效）。
<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> Importing old projects and YYZ projects is <b1>not</b1> available with the Trial Licence of the product.
<b0>重要！</b0> 导入旧版项目和YYZ项目在试用版（Trial License）产品中不可用。
<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> This function is <b1>not</b1> available with the Trial Licence of the product.
<b0>重要！</b0>该函数在试用版（Trial License）产品中<b1>不</b1>可用。
<b0>Image Scaling</b0>: This controls how the background image will be scaled within the different workspaces.
<b0>图像尺度（Image Scaling）</b0>：该选项控制了背景图像在各个工作区下如何被缩放。
<b0>Immediately Open New Resources</b0>: If this is checked, every time you create a new resource in the Resource Tree, the corresponding resource editor will be opened automatically.
<b0>立即打开新资源（Immediately Open New Resources）</b0>：如果此项被勾选，每次你在资源树创建新资源的时候，相应的资源编辑器会被自动打开。

<b0>Import Project</b0> - If you have a project made with the <b1><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 1.4</b1> software from YoYo Games, you can select this option to import either the <t3>*.gmx</t3> or the <t4>*.gmz</t4> file.
<b0>导入项目（Import Project）</b0> - 如果你有使用来自YoYo Games的<b1><i2>GameMaker Studio</i2> 1.4</b1>软件制作的项目，您可以选择该选项来导入<t3>*.gmx</t3>或<t4>*.gmz</t4>文件。

<b0>Initial default draw colour for new projects</b0>: When you use a font or draw a shape using the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> functions or DnD™ actions without specifying a colour, the colour set here is the one that will be used.
<b0>在新工程中默认的绘制初始色（Initial default draw colour for new projects）</b0>：当你使用<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的函数或拖拽按钮（DnD™）动作调用字体或绘制形状时若没有指定绘制颜色，则会使用此处的颜色。
<b0>Keep tabs</b0>: If checked, this will keep tab key presses as tab characters - '\t' - in the editor, while unchecked means that tabs are converted into spaces.
<b0>保持tabs</b0>：如果选中， 这将使编辑器中按下tab键作为tab字符-‘\t’，而不选中则表示tabs转化为空格?。

<b0>Knowledge Base</b0> - This will take you to the <a1><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> Help Center</a1> where you can find articles on platform setup, known issues, using <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> and a number of other things.

<b0>知识库（Knowledge Base）</b0> - This will take you to the <a1><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> Help Center</a1> where you can find articles on platform setup, known issues, using <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> and a number of other things.
<b0>Line Colour</b0> - Here you can set the colour (including alpha value) for the image grid.
<b0>网格线颜色（Line Colour）</b0> - 在此处你可以设置图像网格的颜色（包括透明度值）。
<b0>Line Colour</b0> - This option permits you to set the colour (including the alpha component) of the room grid lines.
<b0>线条颜色（Line Colour）</b0> - 这个选项允许你设置房间网格线的颜色（包括透明度分量）。
<b0>Load Layout</b0> - This will open a file explorer where you can select a previously saved layout <t1>*.xml</t1> file for loading.
<b0>载入布局（Load Layout）</b0> - 该选项会打开一个文件资源管理器，在这里你可以选择载入之前被保存过的<t1>*.xml</t1>布局文件。
<b0>Logout</b0> - Selecting this will log you out of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>注销（Logout）</b0> - 选择该项将会让你登出<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>。
<b0>Mask Overlay Colour</b0> - Set the overlay colour for masks if they are enabled (see above).
<b0>蒙版遮罩颜色（Mask Overlay Colour</b0> - 如果启用于蒙版覆盖，设置遮罩的颜色。
<b0>Match indent on new lines</b0>: Enable or disable auto-indentation for your code.
<b0>在另起行保持缩进</b0>：启用或者禁用你代码的自动缩进。
<b0>Maximum amount of recently used actions</b0>: In the action toolbox there is a library at the top which holds the actions you have most recently used.
<b0>最近使用动作的最大数量（Maximum amount of recently used actions）</b0>：在动作工具箱的顶端有一个库，其持有你最近使用过的动作按钮。

<b0>Maximum number of resources open simultaneously before warning</b0>: You can select multiple resources for opening at a time by using <i1> + <i2> to select them and then right clicking <i3> and choosing <i4>open all</i4>.
<b0>发生警告前同时打开资源的最大数目（Maximum number of resources open simultaneously before warning）</b0>：你可以使用<i1> + <i2>同时选择多个资源然后右键点击<i3>并选择<i4>打开全部（open all）</i4>一次性打开。
<b0>Maximum number of search results to display</b0>: This option controls the maximum number of returned results when you use the Go To search window.
<b0>搜索结果显示的最大数目（Maximum number of search results to display）</b0>：该选项控制着你使用前往搜索窗口时返回搜索结果的最大数量。
<b0>Maximum size of toolbox Action thumbnails</b0>: At the bottom of the Action Toolbox you have a slider for changing the size of the Drag and Drop icons.
<b0>工具箱中动作按钮的缩略图最大尺寸（Maximum size of toolbox Action thumbnails）</b0>：在动作按钮工具箱的底部你会看到一个滑条来改变拖拽按钮的图标大小。
<b0>Minimum size of toolbox Action thumbnails</b0>: At the bottom of the Action Toolbox you have a slider for changing the size of the Drag and Drop icons.
<b0>工具箱中动作按钮的缩略图最小尺寸（Minimum size of toolbox Action thumbnails）</b0>：在动作按钮工具箱的底部你会看到一个滑条来改变拖拽按钮的图标大小。

<b0>Minimum zoom level to allow mouse interaction with window contents</b0>: This option controls the zoom cut-off point at which the mouse will no longer be able to interact with workspace windows (ie: add nodes, drag windows, etc...).
<b0>允许鼠标与窗口内容互动的最小缩放级别（Minimum zoom level to allow mouse interaction with window contents）</b0>：该选项控制缩放的中断点，缩放级别低于该点时鼠标酱不再与工作区内的窗口进行互动（例如：增加节点、拖拽窗口等……）。
<b0>My Account</b0> - This option will open your default web browser and take you to your YoYo Account page.
<b0>我的帐户（My Account）</b0> - 该选项将会在你的默认网页浏览器上打开您的YoYo Account（YYA）帐户页面。

<b0>My Library</b0> - View your current Marketplace content library.
<b0>我的库（My Library）</b0> - 查看你当前的市场内容库。
<b0>My Purchase History</b0> - This option will open a browser and take you to the account page for the logged in user so you can see the purchase history for that account.
<b0>我的购买历史记录（My Purchase History）</b0> - 该选项将会打开一个浏览器并带你到你的账户页面，在这个页面里你可以看到你为此账户购买的历史记录。

<b0>NOTE</b0>: A particle emitter, once created, remains resident in the system memory for the duration of the game, and so if you need to recreate it at any point (for example, if you call the <a1>Restart Game</a1> action), then you <b2>must destroy the current particle emitter</b2> otherwise you get a memory leak.

<b0>注意</b0>： While this section deals with scripts, the code window that you write your scripts in is the same as that for <a1>Events</a1>, <a2>room or instance creation code</a2> or <a3>Shaders</a3>, and the functionality outlined here applies to all of them.
<b0>NOTE</b0>: With the included files and extensions you can select a target platform for them to export to.

<b0>注意</b0>： You can't use a matrix constant as an argument with this function, so if you wish to multiply the (for example) view matrix with a custom matrix that you have built, you must first call <a1><t2>matrix_get(type)</t2></a1> and assign the view matrix values to an array variable, then multiply it by your custom matrix, and then set the chosen matrix (view, projection or world).

<b0>New Drag and Drop Project</b0>: This will create a new project in which the <a1>Object Editor</a1> (and any other editors that permit code) will be set up to use the <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> <b3>Drag and Drop</b3> interface.
<b0>新建拖拽按钮项目（New Drag and Drop Project）</b0>: 这将创建一个新的项目，其中 <a1>对象编辑器（Object Editor）</a1> (以及允许代码的其他编辑器) 将被设置为使用 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> <b3>拖拽按钮（Drag and Drop）</b3> 界面。
<b0>New GameMaker Language Project</b0>: This will create a project where the default programming is done using the <b1>GameMaker Language</b1> (GML).
<b0>新建GML工程文件（New GameMaker Language Project）</b0>: 这将创建一个项目，默认程序使用的是<b1>GameMaker Language</b1> (GML).
<b0>New Project</b0> - This is for creating a new project from scratch in <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>新建项目（New Project）</b0> - 该选项可以在<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>中创建一个全新的项目（工程）
<b0>打开手册（Open Manual）</b0> - 打开帮助文档。
<b0>Open Project In Explorer</b0> - This will open the save location of the currently loaded project in the OS file explorer.
<b0>在资源管理器中打开项目（Open Project In Explorer）</b0> - 该选项将会在操作系统的文件资源管理器中打开保存当前被载入项目的位置。
<b0>Open Project</b0> - This will open the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> file explorer for you to select a previously created <t2>*.yyp</t2> project file for loading.
<b0>打开项目（Open Project）</b0> - 该选项会打开<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的文件浏览器来供你选择以前创建过的<t2>*.yyp</t2>项目文件并载入。

<b0>Open event scripts as tabs in same window</b0> - When adding code or Drag and Drop to an event, the code window is chained to the event window, and when this option is checked any further events that are opened for editing will be added to the same window as tabs along the top.
<b0>在同一个窗口以标签的形式打开事件脚本</b0> - 添加脚本或者拖拽到一个事件中时，代码窗口将链接到事件窗口，然而当这个选项被勾选时，任何之后打开编辑的事件将添加到同一个窗口中，沿着窗口的顶部依次添加。
<b0>Open linked scripts as tabs in same window</b0> - When you have multiple linked scripts and open them, by default they will be grouped n the same window as tabs.
<b0>在同一个窗口以标签的形式打开链接的脚本</b0> - 当你拥有多个链接的脚本并且打开它们，默认它们将分组 在相同的窗口中以标签的形式打开。
<b0>Open object events in full screen editor</b0> - Checking this option will make object event code editors open automatically in a new workspace.
<b0>在全屏编辑器中打开物体事件</b0> - 勾选此项将自动在新的工作区打开物体事件代码。
<b0>Open scripts in full screen editor</b0> - Checking this option will make script resources open automatically in a new workspace.
<b0>在全屏编辑器中打开脚本（Open scripts in full screen editor）</b0> - 勾选此项将让脚本自动在新的工作区打开。
<b0>Open shaders in full screen editor</b0> - Checking this option will make shader resources open automatically in a new workspace.
<b0>在全屏编辑器中打开着色器（Open shaders in full screen editor）</b0> -勾选此项将使着色器自动在新的工作区打开。

tu.note: 此处翻译需斟酌。

tuv.seg: <b0>Open the image editor when double clicking on a sprite resource</b0>: By default double clicking <i1> on any resource will open that resource for editing, but often when dealing with sprites, after the initial setup when you create the new resource, you open it to edit the image rather than the sprite properties.
<b0>双击精灵资源打开图像编辑器（Open the image editor when double clicking on a sprite resource）</b0>：默认双击<i1>任何资源都将打开编辑，但是经常在处理精灵的时候，你创建新的资源的初始化设置之后，你打开它编辑图像而不是精灵属性。
<b0>Options for Merge Tool</b0>: In this field you can add any extra commands to be run whenever you use the Merge Tool.
<b0>合并工具选项（Options for Merge Tool）</b0>：在此字段你可以添加任何额外的命令，在使用合并工具时都将运行。
<b0>Password for username</b0>: Here you must enter the password associated with the username that you give above.
<b0>用户密码（Password for username）</b0>：在这里，你必须输入上面提供的用户名关联的密码。
<b0>Path Rotation Sensitivity</b0> - Set the sensitivity for rotating paths.
<b0>路径旋转敏感度（Path Rotation Sensitivity）</b0> - 设置路径旋转的敏感度。
<b0>Path Scale Sensitivity</b0> - Set the sensitivity for scaling paths.
<b0>路径放大的敏感度</b0> - 设置放大路径的敏感度。
<b0>Path to Merge Tool</b0>: Here you specify the full file path to the Git merge tool.
<b0>合并工具路径（Path to Merge Tool）</b0>：在此处指定 Git 合并工具的完整文件路径。

<b0>Path to external editor/viewer for SWF files</b0>: If you are working with SWF format sprites, you can set this to the path of your preferred viewer/editor and when you click the <i1>Edit Image</i1> button in the Sprite Editor then it will open the given program.
<b0>SWF文件的外部编辑器/查看器（Path to external editor/viewer for SWF files）</b0>：如果你要处理SWF类型的精灵，你可以将该选项设置为你喜欢的查看器/编辑器的路径，并且当你在精灵编辑器（Sprite Editor）中点击<i1>编辑精灵（Edit Sprite）</i1>按钮的时候，它会打开被给定的程序。

<b0>Path to external editor/viewer for Spine files</b0>: If you are working with Spine format sprites, you can set this to the path of your preferred viewer/editor and when you click the <i1>Edit Image</i1> button in the Sprite Editor then it will open the given program.
<b0>Spine文件的外部编辑器/查看器（Path to external editor/viewer for Spine files）</b0>：如果你要处理Spine类型的精灵，你可以将该选项设置为你喜欢的查看器/编辑器的路径，并且当你在精灵编辑器（Sprite Editor）中点击<i1>编辑精灵（Edit Sprite）</i1>按钮的时候，它会打开被给定的程序。
<b0>Persistent</b0> - A persistent object is one that does not go away when the room is changed, but rather it "persists" and is carried over into the new room.
<b0>持久化</b0> - 持久化对象是房间改变时不会消失的对象，而是“持续存在”并被转移到新房间中。
<b0>Port for Debugger to use</b0>: This sets the port number for the Debug Module to use.
<b0>调试器使用的端口（Port for Debugger to use）</b0>：该选项设置调试模块所使用的网络端口。
<b0>Port number to use for the web server</b0>: This sets the port number for the micro web server to use.
<b0>网络服务器所使用的端口（Port number to use for the web server）</b0>：该选项设置了供MWS使用的端口号。
<b0>Preferences</b0> - Selecting this will take you to the <a1>Preferences Windows</a1> where you can set up how <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>looks and feels.
<b0>偏好设置（Preferences）</b0> - 选择该项将会带你到<a1>偏好设置（Preferences）窗口</a1>，在这里你可以设置<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>的外观和操作感。
<b0>Publisher Name</b0>: This is the name that will be used as the Publisher name for the asset.
<b0>发布者名称（Publisher Name）</b0>：此处名称将用于资源发布者的名字。
<b0>Recent Projects</b0> - You can use this option to view recently used projects.
<b0>最近项目（Recent Projects）</b0> - 您可以使用该选项来查看近期使用过的项目。
<b0>Release Notes</b0> - This will open the <a1>Release Notes</a1> for <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> in your browser.
<b0>版本信息（Release Notes）</b0> - 该选项会在你的浏览器中打开<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>的<a1>版本发行信息</a1>
<b0>Required SDKs</b0> - Due to the cross-platform nature of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> a number of 3rd party SDK's are required.
<b0>必需的（Required SDKs）</b0> - 由于<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>跨平台开发的本性，有一些第三方的开发工具包（SDK）是必需的。
<b0>Reset Layout</b0> - This will reset the current IDE layout to the default settings.
<b0>重置布局（Reset Layout）</b0> - 该选项会将IDE布局重置为默认设定。
<b0>Restore Default</b0>: If you have changed the background image to be something other than the default image, you can restore the default using this button at any time.
<b0>恢复默认（Restore Default）</b0>：如果你改变了背景图而不是使用默认图像，你可以随时通过这个按钮来重置为默认图像
<b0>Run</b0> - Run your current project on the chosen target platform for testing.
<b0>运行</b0> - 在选中的平台上运行你当前的项目用于测试。
<b0>Save Layout</b0> - This will open a file explorer where you can name and save the current IDE layout as an <t1>*.xml</t1> file.
<b0>保存布局（Save Layout）</b0> - 该选项会打开一个文件资源管理器，在这里你可以命名并保存当前IDE布局为一个<t1>*.xml</t1>文件。
<b0>Save Project As</b0> - Same as above, only you specify the location and the new name of the project.
<b0>另存项目为（Save Project As）</b0> - 同上，只是你需要另存的新位置及新名称。
<b0>Save Project</b0> - This will save your game to the same location as you defined when you created the project (or where you opened it from).
<b0>保存项目（Save Project）</b0> - 该选项将会保存你的游戏到你创建项目时候所定义的位置。（或者是你打开它的位置）

<b0>Search and replace</b0> - This will open a search window which permits you to search through your entire code (including room creation code, scripts, and events) for a given input - see below for further information.
<b0>查找与替换（Search and replace）</b0> - 它会打开一个搜索窗口，使你能够在整个代码（包括房间创建时代码、脚本以及事件）中查找所输入内容 - 更多信息参见下文。
<b0>Select the IDE skin to use</b0>: Here you can select from the different skins that the IDE can use.
<b0>选择使用的IDE皮肤（Select the IDE skin to use）</b0>：此处你可以选择IDE所能使用的各种皮肤。
<b0>Selection frame colour for locked items in the room</b0>: Sets the colour of the frame that surrounds a selection for assets that have been locked.
<b0>房间内锁定的项目的选择框颜色（Selection frame colour for locked items in the room）</b0>：设置环绕被锁定的资源的选择框的颜色。
<b0>Selection outline colour 1</b0>: The section outline is a dashed line that alternates between two colours.
<b0>选区边框颜色 1（Selection outline colour 1）</b0>：选区边框是一条两种颜色交替出现的虚线。
<b0>Selection outline colour 2</b0>: The section outline is a dashed line that alternates between two colours.
<b0>选区边框颜色 2（Selection outline colour 2）</b0>：选区边框是一条两种颜色交替出现的虚线。
<b0>Should Background Images Be Shown</b0>: This option controls whether the selected background image should be shown or not.
<b0>是否应该显示背景图（Should Background Images Be Shown）</b0>：该选项控制所选的背景图是否应该被显示。

<b0>Should new toolboxes collapse it you have a floating toolbox?</b0>: This option (which is <i1>on</i1> by default) will collapse the toolbox dock in any new editors that are open if you have "pulled" a toolbox out of an event to become a floating window.
<b0>当你有一个浮动的工具箱时是否将其折叠？（Should new toolboxes collapse it you have a floating toolbox?）</b0>：当你将一个工具箱“拉”至一个事件之外并成为一个浮动的窗口时，这个选项（默认为<i1>开</i1>）将会在任何新编辑器中折叠工具箱栏。
<b0>Should the overview panel be collapsed by default?</b0>: Here you can choose to hide the overview panel of the Action Code Editor.
<b0>概览面板是否默认被折叠？（Should the overview panel be collapsed by default?）</b0>：在这里你可以选择是否隐藏动作代码编辑器。

<b0>Show US spelling for system functions</b0>: By default <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> uses English spelling for functions, for example <t2>draw_text_colour</t2>, however this may not be exactly what you ar4e used to and so you can switch to US spellings using this option, so that the functions become <t3>draw_text_color</t3>, for example.

<b0>显示系统函数的美式拼写（Show US spelling for system functions）</b0>：默认地，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>会显示函数的英式拼写，例如<t2>draw_text_colour</t2>，然而这可能不是你所习惯的拼写风格，因此你可以使用这个选项切换到美式拼写，这样一来，就会显示成<t3>draw_text_color</t3>了。
<b0>Show Whitespace</b0>: Display "." to show whitespace (see image below).
<b0>显示空白</b0>：显示“显示空白”（看下图）。

<b0>Show a message when exceeding physics vertex limit</b0>: This option can be used to control the pop up message that is shown when you exceed the permitted vertex number in the physics shape editor.
<b0>当超过物理顶点限制显示一个消息（Show a message when exceeding physics vertex limit）</b0>：在物体形状编辑器中，当你超过允许的顶点数目限制时，这个选项将用来控制信息是否显示。
<b0>Show all compiler commands in compile window during compilation</b0>: This is checked by default and forces the compiler to show all relevant commands in the compile window.
<b0>编译时在编译窗口中显示所有编译指令（Show all compiler commands in compile window during compilation）</b0>：该选项默认被勾选，并强制编译器在编译窗口中显示出所有的相关指令。
<b0>Show all verbose compiler commands</b0>: Checking this will force the compiler to show extra commands related to the compilation process.
<b0>显示所有详细的编译指令（Show all verbose compiler commands）</b0>：勾选该项会强制编译器显示与编译进程相关的更多指令。

<b0>Show default help comment in new events?</b0>: By default this option is enabled and all it does is add a simple comment into the <i1>code editor</i1> for all new events to remind you that you can add your code there.
<b0>新的事件显示默认的注释？（Show default help comment in new events?）</b0>：默认启用，它要做的是对于所有的新创建事件添加简单的注释到<i1>代码编辑器</i1>中，提醒你可以在这里添加代码。
<b0>Show line numbers</b0>: Whether to show the line numbers down the left or not.
<b0>显示行数</b0>：是否在最左侧显示行数。
<b0>Show tab lines</b0>: Display "...." to show tabbed space.
<b0>显示tab线</b0>：显示“....”以显示选项卡式的空间（原文有误，实际测试应该显示很多坚线，坚线间隔一个tab空间）。
<b0>Show the compile window during compilation</b0>: By default the compile window will be shown when you compile your projects, even if the compile doc is closed (it will open for the compile).
<b0>在编译期间显示编译窗口（Show the compile window during compilation）</b0>：默认地，编译窗口会在你编译项目的时候被显示出来，即时在编译停靠栏已经关闭的时候（编译的时候再打开）。
<b0>Show welcome screen on startup</b0>: This is on by default and simply tells <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to show a brief splash screen when you start the program.
<b0>在启动时显示欢迎屏幕（Show welcome screen on startup）</b0>：该选项默认为开，并且只是要求<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>在启动程序的时候显示一个简短的启动画面。
<b0>Size of points</b0> - Set the size of the different nodes and control points to be used.
<b0>点大小（Size of points）</b0> - 设置各个节点与控制点的大小。
<b0>Size</b0>: The size to set the font to for the given output window.
<b0>大小（Size）</b0>: 用于所给定的输出窗口的字体大小。

<b0>Slow double click time (ms)</b0>: Some areas of the IDE require a slower double click to work correctly, for example when renaming a resource (a fast double click will open the resource editor, while a slow double click will permit you to rename it).
<b0>慢双击时间（毫秒）（Slow double click time (ms)）</b0>IDE中的某些位置要求一次较慢的双击（慢双击，Slow Double Click）才能发挥作用，比如重命名一个资源（快速双击（快双击，Fast Double Click）会打开该资源的编辑器，而慢双击才允许你为它更名）。
<b0>Snap To Grid</b0> - If this is checked then the image editor will automatically snap certain tools to the image grid.
<b0>吸附到网格（Snap To Grid）</b0> - 如果勾选此项，图像编辑器就会自动地将某些工具吸附到网格上。
<b0>Snap to grid</b0> - With this option you can set whether a room will have assets snap to the room grid by default or not when a room is initially opened.
<b0>对齐到网格（Snap to grid）</b0> - 使用这个选项你可以设置当一个房间初始化打开时是否默认将资源对齐到房间网格。
<b0>Social Media Icons</b0> - these take you to the various YoYo Games social media sites where you can keep up to date with news about <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>
<b0>社会媒体图标（Social Media Icons）</b0> - 这些将你带到各种YoYo Games的社会媒体网站，那里有 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>到目前为止最新的消息。
<b0>混音器（Sound Mixer）</b0> - 查看<a1>混音器</a1>窗口。
<b0>声音（Sounds）</b0> - 10 （不允许使用音频缓冲区）
<b0>Sprites</b0> - 20 (no dynamic loading permitted, no SWF or Spine sprites permitted)
<b0>精灵（Sprites）</b0> - 20 （不允许动态载入，不允许使用SWF或Spine精灵）
<b0>Start Page</b0> - This will open a new Start Page workspace.
<b0>起始页（Start Page）</b0> - 该选项会打开一个新的起始页工作区
<b0>Style</b0>: The font style to use, like <b1>bold</b1> or <i2>italics</i2> (note that not all windows will permit the same styles and it will also depend on the font used).
<b0>字体样式（Style）</b0>：所使用的字体样式，比如<b1>粗体（Bold）</b1>或<i2>斜体（Italic）</i2>（请注意，不是所有窗口都会允许相同的字体样式，并且这也取决于所使用的字体）。
<b0>Support Forums</b0> - Clicking this will take you to the <a1>Official <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> Support Forums</a1> on the <b3>YoYo Games Knowledge Base</b3>.
<b0>论坛支持（Support Forums）</b0> - 点击该选项将会带您到<a1><b3>YoYo Games知识库</b3><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>官方支持论坛</a1>。
<b0>Syntax checking delay (ms)</b0> - The delay time (in milliseconds) before the syntax checker runs.
<b0>语法检查延迟（Syntax checking delay (ms)）</b0> - 语法检查之前延迟的时间（毫秒）。
<b0>Tab size</b0>: The number of character spaces that pressing "Tab" should indent the code.
<b0>Tab大小</b0>：按下“tab”键应该缩进代码的字符空格数量。
<b0>Temp Location</b0>: The location for saving all the temporary folders.
<b0>临时文件位置（Temp Location）</b0>：该位置用于存储所有的临时文件夹。
<b0>纹理组（Texture Groups）</b0> - 查看<a1>纹理组</a1>窗口。

<b0>The Precision (in pixels) Required To Insert Point On A Path Segment</b0> - This sets the precision value (in pixels) for inserting points on a path, ie: the mouse must be within this range to insert the point rather than add a new one.
<b0>在路径节点插入点的精度（像素）</b0> - 这个设置在路径上插入点的精度值（以像素为单位），即鼠标必须在范围内才能插入点，而不是添加新点。
<b0>The amount of spacing for depth between layers</b0>: When you create multiple layers in the room editor they are automatically assigned a depth based on their position within the layer list.
<b0>层之间深度的间距（The amount of spacing for depth between layers）</b0>：房间编辑器创建多个层时，将会基于层列表的位置自动绑定一个深度。
<b0>The chain alpha at the falloff stop distance</b0>: Sets the final alpha value after the fade out falloff point for the chain alpha.
<b0>衰减停止距离的链条透明度（The chain alpha at the falloff stop distance）</b0>：设置链条透明度淡出衰减点的最终透明度的值。
<b0>The colour for the default background layer added to new rooms</b0>: Sets the initial colour that will be selected as the default for a new background layer.
<b0>添加到新房间的默认背景层颜色（The colour for the default background layer added to new rooms）</b0>：设置初始的颜色，选择作为默认新的背景层的颜色。

<b0>The degree range allowed when looking for a window using shortcuts</b0>: Within a workspace you can have multiple windows open for different objects and resources, and so to move around quickly between them you can use the <a1>keyboard shortcut</a1> <i2> + <i3> + <t4><Arrow Keys></t4> to move between them.
<b0>使用快捷键浏览窗口时允许的角度范围（The degree range allowed when looking for a window using shortcuts）</b0>在一个工作区内你可能会打开多个不同物体和资源的窗口，并且为了快速地在它们之间移动，你会使用<a1>键盘快捷键</a1> <i2> + <i3> + <t4><方向键></t4>来在他们之间切换移动。

tu.note: 此处翻译需斟酌。

tuv.seg: <b0>The distance in pixels that the chain alpha begins to fade out</b0>: Sets the distance from the parent window for the chain link to fade out from.
<b0>链条透明度开始淡出的像素距离（The distance in pixels that the chain alpha begins to fade out）</b0>：设置链条开始淡出的与父窗口的距离。
<b0>The distance in pixels that the chain alpha stops fading out</b0>: Sets the distance from the parent window for the chain link to end fading out to.
<b0>链条透明度停止淡出的像素距离（The distance in pixels that the chain alpha stops fading out）</b0>：设置链条连接结束淡出的与父窗口的距离。

<b0>The initial setting for the Show Views button on opening a room</b0>: If you have views active within a room, this is shown by an outline where the view boundaries would be within the room, and the visibility of this area can be toggled using the dedicated button in the editor itself.
<b0>打开的房间显示视野按钮的初始化设置（The initial setting for the Show Views button on opening a room）</b0>：如果一个房间里有激活的视野，这个可以通过房间里视野边界框可以看出来，这个区域是否可见可以通过专用的按钮进行切换。
<b0>The link colour for workspace chains</b0>: This is the colour that will be used to display chains between workspace elements.
<b0>工作区中连接线的颜色（The link colour for workspace chains）</b0>：该颜色被用于显示工作区元素之间的连接线。

<b0>The padding between two columns in a chain</b0>: Workspace elements are often "chained" to each other (for example, the Code Editor is chained to the Event Editor is chained to the Object Editor), and this option permits you to set the horizontal distance between any two chained windows.
<b0>连接线所连接两个栏目的间隔宽度（The padding between two columns in a chain）</b0>：工作区中的元素彼此之间通常被“连锁”起来（比如说，代码编辑器会被连接到事件编辑器，而事件编辑器再被连接到物体编辑器，这样就形成一个工作链（Work Chain）），那么该选项就允许你设置任意两个相连窗口的之间的水平距离。

<b0>The padding between two rows in a chain</b0>: As mentioned above, workspace elements are often "chained" to each other and this option permits you to set the vertical distance between any two chained windows.
<b0>工作链的行距The padding between two rows in a chain</b0>：如前所述，工作区元素彼此通常都是被“连锁”起来的，该选项允许你设置任意两个相连窗口的纵向距离。
<b0>The properties frame colour for locked items in the room</b0>: Sets the colour of the frame that surrounds the asset properties that have been locked.
<b0>房间里锁定项目的属性框的颜色（The properties frame colour for locked items in the room）</b0>： 设置环绕被锁定的资源的属性框的颜色。
<b0>The properties frame colour for unlocked items in the room</b0>: Sets the colour of the frame that surrounds the asset properties in the room editor that have not been locked.
<b0>房间内未锁定项目的选择框的颜色（The properties frame colour for unlocked items in the room）</b0>：设置房间编辑器中环绕未锁定的资源的选择框的颜色。
<b0>Time in milliseconds to hold the mouse down to drag nodes</b0>: When you click on a node and drag it, you will be repositioning the node within the action code.
<b0>按住鼠标到拖动节点所需的毫秒时间（Time in milliseconds to hold the mouse down to drag nodes）</b0>：当你点击一个节点并拖拽时，你就会在动作代码中改变节点的位置。
<b0>Time in seconds to lock scrolling to a gadget</b0>: This option deals with the time that <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> should wait between scrolling windows that are overlapping.
<b0>锁定部件滚动状态的时间（Time in seconds to lock scrolling to a gadget）###此处原文给的是秒（Seconds），但IDE中给出的是毫秒（milliseconds），因此Seconds被略过###</b0>：该选项用于处理<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>在两个交叠窗口之间滚动的等待时间。
<b0>时间轴（Timelines）</b0> - 2 （不允许创建动态时间轴）
<b0>Transparent background block size</b0> - When you have selected Block Pattern for the background, you can set the size of the individual block here.
<b0>透明背景块大小（Transparent background block size）</b0> - 当你选择方块图案作为背景时，你可以在这里设置每个方块的尺寸。
<b0>Transparent background colour 1</b0> - If you have Single Colour chosen for the background, then the colour used is this one.
<b0>透明背景色 1（Transparent background colour 1）</b0> - 如果你为背景选择了单色模式，那么就会使用这个颜色。
<b0>Transparent background colour 2</b0> - If you have Block Pattern chosen for the background, then the colour used to alternate with colour 1 (above) is this one.
<b0>透明背景色 2（Transparent background colour 2）</b0> - 如果你选择了方块图案作为背景，那么这个颜色就是与颜色 1（上文所述）相交替搭配的另一个颜色。
<b0>Transparent background style</b0> - Here you set the "style" for the background, which can either be "<i1>Block Pattern</i1>" or "<i2>Single Colour</i2>".
<b0>透明背景样式（Transparent background style）</b0> - 这里你可以设置透明背景的显示“样式”，可以为<i1>方块图案（Block Pattern）</i1>，也可以为<i2>单色模式（Single Colour）</i2>。
<b0>Undo / Redo Stack Limit</b0>: Here you can set the Undo/Redo stack limit.
<b0>撤消/重做堆栈限制</b0>：在这里你可以设置撤消/重做的堆栈限制。
<b0>Update Existing Package</b0> - This option will open the <b1>Update Package Wizard</b1> so you can update an existing Marketplace package that you have previously created.
<b0>更新现有的资源包</b0> - 该选项将会打开<b1>资源包更新向导（Update Package Wizard）</b1>以便你能够更新一个现有的市场资源包。
<b0>Use external browser for help</b0>: If this is checked then opening the help file will open it using the default browser for your system.
<b0>使用外部浏览器打开帮助文件（Use external browser for help）</b0>：如果勾选此项，则以后会使用你系统上的默认浏览器打开帮助文件。

<b0>Username to commit as</b0>: Here you must enter the username that you will be using to do any commits to Git with (this must be the same as the username specified when you set up your Git repository).
<b0>用于提交的用户名（Username to commit as）</b0>：在这里你必须输入你将做任何提交到Gi时所使用的用户名（它必须同Git仓库所指定的用户名一致）。
<b0>Verbose Logging</b0>: Enable verbose logging for the Git output log.
<b0>启用详细日志记录（Verbose Logging）</b0>：Git 启用详细日志记录输出日志。
<b0>Vertical pixel spacing</b0> - This value sets the spacing for the vertical lines of the image grid.
<b0>垂直像素间隔（Vertical Pixel Spacing）</b0> - 该值设置图像编辑器网格的垂直线间距。
<b0>Vertical pixel spacing</b0> - This will set the vertical space for gird cells of the room grid in pixels.
<b0>垂直像素间距（Vertical pixel spacing）</b0> - 这将以像素为单位设置房间网格的单元格垂直间距。
<b0>WARNING!:</b0> If the array has over 32,000 entries this function will return an erroneous value and should not be used.
<b0>警告！：</b0>如果该数组具有32000个以上的元素，该函数将会返回一个无法使用的错误的值。
<b0>Welcome Page</b0> - This will open athe initial welcome page slide show in a new workspace.
<b0>欢迎页（Welcome Page）</b0> - 该选项将会在一个新的工作区内打开一个初始欢迎滑动页面。

<b0>What is the default Toolbox location?</b0>: By default the DnD toolbox (where all the different action libraries are held) is placed on the right of the Editor, but you can use this option to have it default to the left.
<b0>默认状态下工具箱的位置？（What is the default Toolbox location?）</b0>：默认状态下DnD的工具箱（持有各种动作库）会出现在编辑器的右侧，但是你可以使用这个选项来让他出现在左侧。

<b0>When does the overview appear next to a node?</b0>: A node "overview" is the short descriptive text that appears beside certain actions in the Action Workspace, for example this <b1>Destroy Instance</b1> action: <i2> You can choose to enable these always, enable them only if the action is collapsed (the default setting), or disable them altogether.
<b0>概览图什么时候出现在节点的旁边？（When does the overview appear next to a node?）</b0>：一个节点的“概览”是出现在某个动作工作区中某个动作旁边的一段简短的描述性文字，比如这个<b1>销毁实例（Destroy Instance）</b1>动作：你可以选择启用一直显示、启用它们在动作块折叠时候显示（默认）或者是禁止它们显示。
<b0>Whether we should reset back to 1:1 when moving between windows using shortcuts</b0>: As mentioned above, you can skip from window to window within the workspace using keyboard shortcuts.
<b0>使用快捷键在窗口间移动时，我们是否应该重置回1:1（Whether we should reset back to 1:1 when moving between windows using shortcuts）</b0>：如前所述，你可以在工作区中通过使用键盘快捷键在窗口之间跳转。
<b0>Window</b0> - Window shortcuts are those that are specific to a single window or tab, unless a gadget shortcut overrides it.
<b0>窗口</b0> - 窗口快捷键是那些专门用于单独窗口或标签页的快捷键，除非部件的快捷键覆盖了该快捷键。
<b0>YoYo Games</b0> - takes you to the main <a1>YoYo Games</a1> website
<b0>YoYo Games</b0> -将你带到<a1>YoYo Games</a1> 官方网站。
<b2>You cannot update assets that have already been uploaded unless the updated package is signed using the same certificate that the original was created with</b2>.
<b2>除非使用之前创建的相同的证书，你不能已经上传的资源。</b2>.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> can also be used in a college environment.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 也可以使用于大学教育。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> comes as a Free version to start with, and then you can buy different upgrades depending on your needs.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 最开始是以试用版许可信息启动的，而后你可以依据你的需求购买升级包。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> comes with a Trial Licence to start with, and then you can buy different upgrades depending on your needs.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 最开始是以试用版许可信息启动的，而后你可以依据你的需求购买升级包。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> is a tool designed to empower you and your team to make new and innovative games as well as prototype ideas in the fastest and most intuitive way possible across multiple target platforms.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 是一个游戏开发工具， 旨在让您和您的团队根据游戏设计的思路以最快，最直观的方式制作游戏，并且能跨平台开发。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> is more than just an IDE and has a number of different runtime tools that it uses behind the scenes to build you games for the different target platforms available.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>不仅有一个IDE，还有一些在幕后运作的不同的运行工具来将你的游戏构建到各种可用平台上。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> itself has no special requirements other than those listed on the <a1>Installing</a1> page and will install any required dependencies the first time you install the product as part of the package.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 除了那些列举在<a1>安装</a1>页面里的东西外本身没有什么特殊要求，并且一旦你安装了本产品的会安装任何要求的依赖项作为包的一部分。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> permits you to specify what <i1>type</i1> of project it is that you wish to create, and you can pick and choose based on your coding knowledge or habits.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 允许您指定希望创建的项目类型，你可以根据你的编码知识或习惯来选择。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> works with cycles of these events - from the moment a room is started to the moment it is finished there is a game loop running where every <b1>step</b1> (a step is a moment in game time, governed by the room speed setting) a series of events are run or checked, and you can choose to place code or DnD actions in your objects that respond to these events.
<i0> GameMaker Studio 2 </i0>适用于这些事件的周期 - 从房间开始到完成之时，每个<b1>步骤</b1>（一步是在游戏时间的一瞬间，由房间速度设置控制），一系列事件被运行或检查，您可以选择将代码或DnD操作放置在响应这些事件的对象中。
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> can have several different runtime tools installed at any one time and you can set which one to use from this preference.
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>可以在任何一个时间安装几个不同的运行库工具，并且你可以从偏好设置中设置使用哪一个。
<i6><b7>NOTE:</b7> This function is only valid for the HTML5, Windows, MacOS, Windows 8 (JS), and Tizen (JS) modules.</i6><br8>
<i6><b7>注意：</b7>该函数仅适用于HTML5、Windows、MacOS、Windows 8 (JS)以及Tizen (JS)模块。</i6><br8>
A Remote Worker with this name already exists.
已存在具有此名称的远程工作者。
A Runtime download is already in progress.
运行库下载已经在进行中。
A boolean is simply a value that can either be <t0>true</t0> or <t1>false</t1>.
A branch to execute in a switch if the case is true.
Switch分支中当满足情形时所执行的分支。
A default switch case for when no other case is matched.
当没有其他情形匹配时的默认情形。
A dimension input has been set along with both the associated anchors
已经设置了一个维度的输入，连同关联的锚点A dimension input has been set along with both the associated anchors
A dimension input has been set along with both the associated anchors, the dimension input will be ignored
大小已经设置与关联的锚点一致，大小的输入将被忽略。

A duplicate of stylename '{0}' was found in
'{1}'
the style will continue to be saved in
'{2}'

样式名为“{0}”的副本被发现在
'{1}'
样式将继续保存在
'{2}'
A file with the same name already exists.
A general description of what the script does.
A generic loop that continues until a Break action is hit.
遇到跳出动作（Break）之前会持续执行的常规循环。
A gesture event (Tap, Drag, Flick, Pinch or Rotate)
手势事件（轻敲、拖动、划动、捏合或旋转）
A great many things are different between GameMaker Studio 2 and <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 1.4, and so your older projects may need some tweaking for them to work.
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>和 <i1>GameMaker Studio 1.4</i1>之间存在很多差异，因此你的旧版项目可能需要一些调整之后才能运作。
A group cannot be a child of itself.
一个组不可以是自身的子级。
A parent reliant anchor (bottom or right) has been set with no parent gadget
一个父依赖锚点（右底）已经被设置为没有父组件?
A parent reliant anchor (bottom or right) has been set with no parent gadget, try setting the dimension instead
一个父依赖锚点 (底部或右部) 已被设置为没有父部件，作为替代，请尝试设置大小。
A physics shape cannot have more than 8 points.
物理形状不能超过8个点。
A pointer is a data type that "points" to a memory location.
指针是一个“指向”一个内存位置（Memory Location）的一种数据类型
A self-contained loop structure with initialise, condition and increment statements.
一个带有初值、条件和步进语句的完备的循环结构。
A string is simply any text that has been placed in quotation marks (either '...' or "...").
一个字符串就是简单地使用引号（可以是'...'也可以是"..."）括起来的任意一段文本。
A texture ({1}x{2}) exceeds the maximum supported dimension ({3}x{3}) and cannot be loaded.
纹理 ({1}x{2}) 超过最大支持的尺寸 ({3}x{3}) ，不能加载。
A view with this name already exists.
已经存在此名称的视图。
Mac 上的 ADB 路径

tu.note: 中止错误？应该是一个异常的中止的错误。

Add Folder Containing Android Source files
添加包含Android源文件的文件夹

在'{0}'前面添加菜单栏项目

在下方添加菜单分隔符
在'{0}'后面添加新的选项卡

为文本选择添加偏差以防止线条跳跃(?)
Add content to Included Files "TutorialContent" folder
添加内容至内含文件的"TutorialContent" 文件夹
Add default layers when creating a new room?
创建新房间时添加默认的层吗？
Add files for the user to import to Included Files "TutorialResources" folder
添加用户要导入的文件到内含文件的"TutorialResources"文件夹
添加本地源文件的文件夹
添加新的 SSH 密钥对身份验证

After any updates have been installed, you will be required to supply the licence details for your <b3>YoYo Games Account</b3> (see <a4>here</a4>) before being able to use the product, meaning that the first time you use <i5>GameMaker Studio 2</i5> you <b6>must have an internet connection</b6>.
在所有更新都安装后，在使用产品之前你将会被要求为你的<b3>YoYoGames 账户</b3>（参见这<a4>这里</a4>）提供许可的详细信息，这意味着初次使用<i5>GameMaker Studio 2</i5>的时候，你<b6>必须联网</b6>
After building a package highlight it in an explorer window
创建包后在资源管理器窗口中高亮显示。
After logging in and starting a new project, <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> will take you to the initial <b1>workspace</b1> with some basic windows docked to the IDE.
登录并开启一个新项目之后, <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 会带你到最开始的 <b1>工作区</b1> ，一些基本的窗口停靠在 IDE上.
After setting up the Merge Tool, you can then set up the <i0>User Identity</i0> with these options:
设置完合并工具后，你可以使用这些选项设置<i0>用户身份（User Identity）</i0>：
After the initial login, you should be able to use the product offline, however it will periodically require that you connect to verify the login account.
经过初始登录后，你应该就可以离线地使用本产品了，但是它会定期地要求你联网来验证登录账户。
Alias must be longer than 5 characters

别名密码必须长于5个字符
All real numbers are stored as 32bit floating point values (even integer values), so you may experience slight rounding errors when dealing with these.
所有的实数都被存储为一个32位的浮点数（即使是个整数），因此在处理这些数据的时候你可能会遇到一些轻微的舍入误差（Rounding Errors）。
除Windows 8 (JS)以外的所有目标平台

All targets come with two compile options, one is the <b0>VM</b0> that uses a runner and interpreted code and the other which is the <b1>YYC</b1> (YoYo Compiler) which creates native code and a compiled executable.
所有目标平台都有两个编译选项：一个是<b0>VM</b0>，它使用一个运行器来解释代码；另一个是<b1>YYC</b1>，是创建本机代码并编译可执行程序。
All the characters, monsters, balls, walls, etc... are all objects you create in the resource tree.
所有的角色，怪物，球，墙壁等都是您在资源树中创建的对象。

An array is a special data type that can be used to hold multiple values.
数组是一个特殊的数据类型，它们可以用来存储多个值。
An array or two can make it much easier to create a good menu system.
如果有一两个数组的话，创造一个良好的菜单系统就不是什么难事了。
An enum is an "enumerator", and it essentially permits you to create your own limited data type with a list of constant values.
一个枚举也成为一个枚举器（Enumerator），它们允许你使用常量值列表创建自己的有限的数据类型。

Anything under 0 is essentially infinite (limited by the memory available) while positive values will limit the stack to that number, removing any action at the tail of the stack if the limit is reached.
0或者低于0表示不限（受可用内存限制），而正数将限制堆栈为指定的数值，如果达到限制将删除堆栈尾部的动作。

Arrays are essential for making RPGs, because instead of having a jumble of variables, you just have a few lines, which you can refer back to at any time.
制作RPG游戏的时候数组是必要的，因为与其使用一大堆乱七八糟的变量，Arrays are essential for making RPGs, because instead of having a jumble of variables, you just have a few lines, which you can refer back to at any time.
Arrays created in this way will have each entry initialised to 0 unless you specify an (optional) initialisation value.
以这种方式创建的数组中每一元素的都会被初始化为0，除非你指定了初始值（可选）。
Arrays may seem confusing at first, but they can be extremely useful and are an essential part of making games.
数组在一开始看来可能不容易理解，但是它们在游戏制作的过程中是非常有用的也是不可或缺的一部分。
As a very simple example, in the past multiplying by 32 might have taken several CPU cycles to execute, while a simple binary operation to do the same thing would have taken only 1.
一个非常简单的例子，过去乘以32可能需要几个CPU周期来执行，而简单的二进制运算同样的事情只需要一次。
As indicated, wherever you use a parent object, this also applies to the descendants (or "children").
如所示，无论何处使用父对象，这也适用于后代（或“子”）。

As machines have gotten more complex, they have also reduced the time many complex instructions take to run so that now, a 32x32 bit multiply might well only take 1 cycle - same as the binary operator.
因为机器已经变足够复杂了，这也减少了很多复杂指令的运行时间，一个32x32位乘法可能也只需要一个周期 - 同二进制运算一样的效率。
As mentioned above, you can pass a number of arguments to a script, and it will use these to perform the task you have written it for.
如前所述，你可以向一个脚本传递（Pass）一些参数，然后它就会用这些参数来执行你为它所编写的任务。

As you can see in our example object there are a number of events listed that it should respond to, but initially when you create an object this list is empty and you must decide which events you need and what instances of that object should do when those events are triggered.
正如你可以在我们的示例对象中看到的那样列出了许多应该响应的事件，但是最初当你创建一个对象时，这个列表是空的，你必须决定你需要哪些事件，那些对象应该做什么事件被触发。

As you can see, the initial workspace is on a tab at the top of the screen (and you can rename it by double clicking the tab), but you can create further workspaces for the project by clicking the <i0> to the side, giving you multiple possible workspaces for any single project.
如你所见，初始工作区(Workspace 1)位于屏幕顶部的选项卡上 (你能通过鼠标双击选项卡来重命名，双击的间隔要有半秒),，你能创建更多的工作区到你的项目中，点击 选项卡右侧的：<i0> ，能为你的任何单个项目添加多个工作区。
As you can see, where there is a bit in each value, the bit is kept, and where there is a mix or 0's and 1's these are reset to 0.
如你所见，相同位的值一样时，值将保留（都为1，则为1），而值是混合的，一个是0，一个是1，则为0（一个不为1，则为0）。

But, when we talk about affecting or changing an <b4>object</b4>, we mean that we are modifying the object in the resource tree and anything we do to it will be reflected in all the instances created from that point on too.
但是，当我们谈论影响或改变<b4>对象</b4>时，我们意味着我们正在修改资源树中的对象，并且我们所做的任何事情也将反映在从那一点创建的所有实例中。

By assigning objects to a positive collision group (ie: three objects are all in group "<b3>2</b3>") you are telling <i4>GameMaker Studio 2</i4> that instances of these objects should <i5>always collide</i5>, even if they have nothing in their collision event, obeying the physical properties that you have assigned them and the room they are in.
通过将对象分配给一个正面的碰撞组（即：三个对象全部在组“<b3> 2 </b3>”中）你正在告诉<i4> GameMaker Studio 2 </i4>这些对象的实例应该是<i5>总是碰撞</i5>，即使他们在碰撞事件中没有任何东西，服从你分配的物理属性和他们所在的空间。
By checking this box, you are telling GameMaker Studio 2 to basically "ignore" the physical properties of the object, but still return a collision event with the objects around it.
通过选中此框，您正在告诉GameMaker Studio 2基本上“忽略”对象的物理属性，但仍会返回与其周围的对象的碰撞事件。
By default <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> comes with two skins, one light and one dark, and the initial setup uses the dark skin.
默认地<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>本身自带两种皮肤，一个是浅色皮肤，一个是深色皮肤，初始安装时会使用深色皮肤。
By default an object will use the collision properties of the sprite assigned to it, but there are cases whereby you may want collisions to be based off of a different mask shape.
默认情况下，一个对象将使用分配给它的sprite的碰撞属性，但是有时您可能希望碰撞基于不同的掩码形状。
By default it shows both a Tree View (on the left) and a List View (on the right) but using this preference you can choose to have it only show one or the other.
默认地，它会同时显示一个树状视图（左侧）和一个列表视图（右侧），但通过使用该设定，你可以选择只显示一个或另一个。

By default the corresponding resource editor will also be opened for editing when this happens, but un-checking this option will prevent the editors from being opened and you will be required to open them manually.
默认地，当这种情况发生时，相应的资源编辑器会被打开，而解除该选项将会阻止编辑器被自动打开，并且你需要手动地打开他们。
By default this has one section dedicated to the <b2>Source Control</b2> plugin for integrating <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> projects with <a4>Git</a4>.
默认有一个专门的子项<b2>源码控制</b2>插件整合<i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3>项目与<a4>Git</a4>工具。
By default this is a grid of grey squares, but you can use the following settings to change it:
默认地，网格为灰色正方形，但你可以用下列设定来改变它：
By default this is checked as on.
By default this is disabled and enabling it will remove the plain text list of action chains from the editor.
默认该选项是禁用的，启用它将会移除编辑器左侧的纯文本动作链
By default this is on, but can be set to OK to skip the message as if you'd clicked okay.
该选项默认为开（On），但你可以将其设置为允许放行该消息，就好像你已经点过确认按钮那样。

By default you will be prompted to continue importing and overwrite the existing image or cancel the operation, and this option lets you suppress this message and either cancel the import, "No", or overwrite the current sprite, "Yes".
默认情况下将提示你继续导入并覆盖现在图像或取消操作，这个选项允许你禁止这个信息显示，然后要么是取消导入（选择"否"NO），要么是覆盖当前精灵（选择“是” Yes）。

By default, the collision group for all physics objects is <b0>0</b0>, and this means that they will interact as normal, which in turn means they <b1>must have a collision event to interact</b1> (a simple comment will do to trigger the collision) otherwise no collision will be registered.
默认情况下，所有物理对象的碰撞组是<b0> 0 </b0>，这意味着它们将正常相互作用，这又意味着它们必须有一个碰撞事件进行交互</b1>一个简单的评论将会触发碰撞）否则不会发生冲突。
By default, the visible flag is checked.
By setting this option to "OK" you can remove this message and permit frame deletion without further messages being shown.
设置此项为“是”（OK），你就可以去掉这些消息并且在接下来没有任何消息显示的情况下就可以删除帧。
By setting this option to "OK" you can remove this message and permit frame edition to be committed without further messages being shown when you change tools.
设置此项为“是”（OK），你就可以去掉这些消息并且在接下来当你改变工具的时候没有任何消息显示的情况下就提交修改。
By setting this option to "Okay" the message will be suppressed as if you had clicked the "Okay" button to proceed.
通过设置这个选项为“确定（Okay）”，消息将会被阻止，就好像你已经点击了“确定”继续了。
By setting this option to "Okay" the warning will be suppressed as if you had clicked the "Okay" button to proceed.
通过设置这个选项为“确定（Okay）”，警告消息将会被阻止，如果已经点击了“确定”。

Compressing data structures is a good thing, because if you use less memory, you get less cache misses, and your code just runs faster.
压缩数据结构是一件非常好的事情，因为如果你使用的内存越少，缓存丢失的也就越少，而你的代码就可以运行地更快。

Conversely, if you have objects with a negative collision group (ie: four objects assigned "<b6>-1</b6>"), you are telling <i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> that these should <i8>never collide</i8>, and any collision events between them will be ignored.
相反，如果您的对象具有负面的碰撞组（即：分配了“<b6> -1 </b6>”的四个对象），则说明<i7> GameMaker Studio 2 </i7>碰撞</ i>，并且它们之间的任何碰撞事件将被忽略。

Damping is also much cheaper to simulate than friction, but please note that damping is not a replacement for friction; the two effects can, and should, be used together.
模拟阻尼比摩擦要便宜得多，但请注意，阻尼不是摩擦的替代品;这两个效果可以而且应该一起使用。
Damping is used to reduce the physics world velocity of an instance, and differs from friction in that friction only occurs when two instances with collision shapes (fixtures) are in contact.
阻尼用于降低实例的物理世界速度，并且与摩擦不同，因为摩擦力仅在碰撞形状（弹性）的两个实例接触时才发生。

Each 1 or 0 represents a single <i0>bit</i0> of data, and as you can see this means that in binary, 10 equals 2!
每个 1 或 0 代表一个单个 <i0>位</i0> 数据，“10”等于2！
Each bit is <i1>2 times the previous value</i1> with the first bit being equal to 1.
首位等于1，每一位 <i1>是之前值的2倍</i1>。
Each entry has a number of sub-entries to permit you to define exactly how each separate piece of text should look, as shown in the example image above.
每个条目都有一些子条目，以便您可以准确的定义每个单独的文本应如何显示，如上面示例图所示。

Each of the console targets comes with two compile options, one is the <b0>VM</b0> that uses a runner and interpreted code and the other which is the <b1>YYC</b1> (YoYo Compiler) which creates native code and a compiled executable.
每个控制台目标平台都有两个编译选项，一个是使用运行器和解释代码的<b0>VM（虚拟机）</b0>，另一个是创建本机代码和编译可执行文件的<b1>YYC</b1>（YoYo编译器）。

tuv.seg: Here you add events, which are the "building blocks" of your game code, set whether the object is to have a parent and also set the physics properties if you want to enable the physics functions.
在这里，您可以添加事件，即游戏代码的“构建块”，设置对象是否具有父项，如果要启用物理功能，还可以设置物理属性。
Here you can find a complete list of all the keyboard shortcuts for an easy reference guide.
在这里你可以查阅键盘快捷键的完整列表作为一个简单参考向导。
Here you can get an overview of the GameMaker Language syntax along with examples of use and program structure, and you can also find a complete reference guide for all the built-in GML functions.
在这里你可以看到GameMaker语言语法的概述，以及使用方法和程序结构的例子，你还可以找到所有内置GML函数的完整的参考指南。
Here you can give your object a name.
在这里你可以给你的对象一个名字。
Here you can select the behaviour of the confirmation dialogues when working with a resource from the resource tree.

Here you can select the behaviour of the confirmation dialogues when you perform different actions on the current sprite.
在这里你可以设置当你对当前精灵执行各种动作时的确认行为。
Here you can set the ddifferent options for how some of the drawing tools operate and are shown.
在这里你可以设置图像编辑器中一些工具的操作和显示方式的各种选项。
Here you can set the options for the background that you edit your sprite images over.
此处你可以为你编辑精灵图片下面的背景做以设定。

However if you have any licence other than the Free licence, then you will also be required to set up and maintain the SDK's and other build tools that the export modules for the licence require.

However setting this option to "Ok" will not show the message and just not let you add the resource.

然而有些更新包含重要的修复和改进而不能被跳过，并且<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>在这种情况下会强制更新。

However you can choose to have view boundaries invisible when you open a room by un-checking this option (the button can still be used to show them again).

然而通过将此项选择为“是”（Okay），你可以抑制该消息的产生并自动重置布局，而如果选“否”（No）则什么也不会发生。

However, by default <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> comes with a number of already powerful tools, like a complete <b2>Image Editor</b2> for creating your own sprites and tile-sets that will also import images that you have made in any external editor, including <i3>Spine skeleton animations</i3> and <i4>SWF format</i4> vector files.
而且，默认 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 已经自带一些强大的工具，比如一个完整的 <b2>图片编辑器</b2> 可以用来创建你自己的精灵或图块集，也可以导入外置编辑器完成的图片， 包括<i3>Spine 骨骼动画</i3> 和 <i4>SWF 格式</i4> 矢量文件。
However, checking this box will make a static object kinematic and although it will be unaffected by collisions and gravity, it can still be moved around or rotated using the appropriate variables.
但是，检查此框将使静态对象运动，尽管它不会受到碰撞和重力的影响，但是仍然可以使用适当的变量移动或旋转。

然而，它只有二个状态，一个<t2>真</t2> / <t3>假</t3>值理想的情况是储存在一个位上，如果我们这样做，每个INT我们可以储存32个<t4>真</t4> / <t5>假</t5>位，而不是只是一个。<br6>
However, please realize that even with a program like <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>, designing computer games is not completely effortless - so no "make me a MMORPG" button here!
然而，请意识到，就算有像 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>这样的游戏制作工具，设计电脑游戏也不是毫不费力的 ，所以没有 "给我制作一个MMORPG" 这种按钮！

但是，您也可以指定对象应属于特定的<b2>碰撞组</b2>。

但是，您可以在VM构建中使用 GMS2 Profiler。

tuv.seg: Ideally you want to be using the most up-to-date runtime, but sometimes it may have an issue, or you may be required to use an older one for comparability, etc... and so you can change the runtime tools that <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> uses to build your game here.
理想情况下，你希望使用最新的运行库，但某些情况可能会出现问题，为了兼容，或许你需要使用旧的版本等等……因此你可以更改<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>使用的运行库工具来创建你的游戏。

如果关闭，代码将不会样式化，而打开它将会使用上面的颜色选项中给定的格式进行样式化处理。

如果没有勾选上，将在当前工作区的窗口中打开。
