如果我们开始造一个字节（存储0至255之间的数字）以外的值，难度会开始变大。
If we wanted to set the second bit, we would do this:
如果我们想要设置第二个位，我们要这样做：
If we were doing this in assembler, we actually get BOTH values in one divide, but you don't get this in high level languages (well… not very often), and so you have to do all the work twice.
假如我们是在汇编语言（Assembler）上完成这件事，我们实际上会在一次除法当中同时得到这两个值，但是在高级语言中你不会得到这种结果（应该说，不是很常见），并且因此你必须做两次所有的工作。
If you also want to execute the parent event you can call the so-called "inherited" event using the appropriate action or code.
如果还要执行父事件，可以使用相应的操作或代码调用所谓的“继承”事件。

If you are a more experienced programmer, then you can use the propriety scripting language <b2>GML</b2> to create your games, or you can even combine both and call GML functions with (and from) DnD™ actions, giving you a great deal of flexibility when it comes to how you write things.
如果你是一个更有经验的程序员，你更适合使用脚本语言 <b2>GML</b2> 创建你的游戏，或者你甚至可以结合两者，使用DnD™动作调用函数，在你写代码的时候，给你极大的灵活性。
If you are new to using a scripting language then it is recommended that you start with the GML Overview, otherwise just use the reference guide to check up on function names when required:
如果你是脚本使用的新手，建议从GML概述开始，不然只需要使用参考指南去查找所需要的函数名就可以了：
If you are using <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> on a laptop, then you will have a further option at the top of the IDE for <b1>Laptop Mode</b1>:
如果你正在一个笔记本电脑上使用<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>，那么在IDE的顶端会有一个选项为<b1>平板模式（Laptop Mode）</b1>：
If you are using the Arc Tool <i0> then here you can set the different colours used to draw the node properties:
如果你使用了弧线工具（Arc Tool）<i0>那么你可以在这里设置用于绘制节点属性的各种颜色：
If you choose "No", then frame edition will be silently cancelled when you change tools.
如果你选“否”（No），则帧编辑器会在你改变工具时静默地取消修改。
If you do supply the extra value for initialising the array, then all indices within the new array will be set to that instead of 0, but note that the function will take longer to run.
如果你额外提供了一个值用于初始化这个数组，那么新数组中的所有索引元素都将被设置为该值而非0，但请注意，这样一来函数也将需要花费更多的时间来运行。
If you don't have a certificate, you can create one:
如果没有证书，请创建一个：

如果您有<b0>矩形</b0>掩码，则可以移动四个角中的任何一个，但相应的角将自动调整位置，以始终保持矩形
If you have a <b0>circular</b0> mask, then you can only pull any of the path points to make the circle diameter larger or smaller
如果您有一个<b0>圆形</b0>遮罩，则只能拉任何路径点，使圆直径更大或更小
If you have a <b0>custom</b0> (polygon) mask, it must have a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 8 points to it, and it must be convex (see image below).

If you have a previously created certificate then you can click the file browser button here and add it in to the forum, but if you do <i2>not</i2> have a certificate and wish to make one, then you should omit any information here and instead click to the <b3>Create New Certificate</b3> button explained below.
如果你之前创建了一个整数那么你可以点击此处的文件浏览按钮来将其添加到社区当中，但如果你<i2>没有</i2>证书文件而想要有一个，那么你应该忽略此处所有信息而去点击下文将要解释的<b3>创建新证书（Create New Certificate）</b3>按钮
If you have not previously made a certificate file for using the Marketplace, then you should click the button labelled <b0>Create New Certificate</b0> at the bottom of this form.
如果你之前没有为市场创建一个证书文件的话，那么你需要点击表单底部标有<b0>创建新证书（Create New Certificate）</b0>按钮。
If you have not turned on Source Control, you can find it in Main Options.
如果尚未打开“源码管理”，则可以在“主选项”中找到它。

If you have selected more than the number specified in this option, then you will be shown a warning, since having too many resources open at one time can cause issues with performance on lower end machines.
如果你选中的数目超过选项中的数目，你将会看到警告信息，因为同时打开太多的资源在低配电脑上会出出一些性能上的问题。
If you mouse over them then you can see the full project name and path, and clicking <i0> will open the project.
如果将鼠标移到上方，你可以看到完整的项目名称和路径，点击 <i0> 将打开这个项目。

If you think about any rotating object in the "real world", unless it has a motor or is in space, it slows down over time due to the influence of external forces (like friction with the air around it).
如果您考虑“现实世界”中的任何旋转物体，除非有电机或空间，否则由于外力（如与其周围的空气的摩擦）的影响，它会随着时间的推移而减慢。

If, after changing the options here to customise <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> to your own tastes, you wish to back up the preferences that you have set you need to go to the folder <t1><b2>%AppData%/GameMakerStudio2/<your_account_name>/</b2></t1> and then copy the following two files to a safe place:

在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中你会拥有物体以及实例。

In <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> all images are considered sprites, and the use you put them too will depend on the <i2>layer</i2> they are assigned to in the room.

In Laptop Mode you can pan, scroll and zoom by moving the mouse over an area\nwhile holding Left Control to zoom and Left Alt to pan and scroll.\nUse ${LaptopRHSKeys} for non-mouse interactions while Laptop Mode is enabled.
在笔记本电脑模式下，您可以平移，滚动和缩放，在区域上移动鼠标同时按住左控制键进行缩放，使用左Alt键进行平移和滚动。\n启用笔记本电脑模式时，使用${LaptopRHSKeys}进行非鼠标交互。

In Laptop Mode you can pan, scroll and zoom by moving the mouse over an area\nwhile holding Left Control to zoom and Left Alt to pan and scroll.\nUse Right Control and Right Alt for non-mouse interactions while Laptop Mode is enabled.
笔记本模式下你可以通过在一个范围内移动鼠标进行平移，滚动和缩放，按住左Ctrl缩放，左Alt平移和滚动。\n笔记本模式开启时使用右Ctrl和右Alt 进行无鼠标的交互。
In general this is only required when debugging and may be requested by support should you have an issue.

In general you can click the left mouse button<i1> to select anything, use <i2> + <i3> to select multiple items, hold <i4> to drag items into different docks or onto the workspaces, and also the <i5> to open context specific menus.

In physics, restitution is defined as "<i0>the return of an object or system to its original state after elastic deformation</i0>", but as the fixtures in the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> are really <b2>rigid bodies</b2> and cannot be deformed, restitution is really a way of saying how "bouncy" the fixture is.
在物理学中，恢复原则被定义为“<i0>弹性变形</i0>后物体或系统返回到原始状态”，但是由于<i1> GameMaker Studio 2 </i1>中的灯具真的是<b2>刚体</b2>，不能变形，恢复系数真的是一种说“弹性”的“弹性”的方式。
In previous sections we have covered <a0>variables and their scoping rules</a0> but little has been said about the different <b1>data types</b1> that a variable can store.
在上一部分中，我们讲到了<a0>变量以及它们的作用域规则</a0>，但是对于变量所能存储的各种<b1>数据类型（Data types）</b1>所谈甚少。

In the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 2D physics world, mass is calculated automatically for you from the values you input for the density and by the surface area of the shape you define for the fixture.
在<i1> GameMaker Studio 2 </i1> 2D物理世界中，质量是根据您为密度输入的值和您为夹具定义的形状的表面积自动计算的。

In these cases you can click the Collision Mask button and select another sprite resource, so now instances of the object will <i1>draw</i1> the assigned sprite, but base collisions off of the <i2>mask</i2> sprite.
在这些情况下，您可以单击“碰撞掩码”按钮并选择另一个精灵资源，因此现在对象的实例将<i1>绘制</ i1>指定的精灵，但是从<i2>掩码</ i2>精灵之间的基础碰撞。

在这种情况下，您可以看到几乎所有事件应该具有相同的操作，除了一个或两个运动的运动。

Invisible objects will still react to events and if they have a sprite or a mask assigned to them, they will also react should other instances collide with them... they just cannot be seen and do not perform their <b1>draw</b1> event.
不可见的物体仍然会对事件作出反应，如果他们有精灵或者遮罩也会发生碰撞事件，他们只不过是不可见并且不会执行绘制事件。 <b1>draw</b1> event.

It also happens when you use the <t0>with()</t0> statement in code (see the manual for further details), and it works when you call code functions like <a1> <t2>instance_position</t2></a1>, <a3> <t4>instance_number</t4></a3>, etc... where if you supply a parent object then it and all child instances will be included in the checks.
当您在代码中使用<t0> with（）</t0>语句时也会发生这种情况（有关更多详细信息，请参阅手册），当您调用代码函数（如<a​​1> <t2> instance_position </t2> </a1>，<a3> <t4> instance_number </t4> </a3>，etc ...如果您提供一个父对象，那么它将会被包含在检查中。

It is also worth noting that you can find third party tutorials and demos from the Marketplace too, and once these have been purchased and added to your account they will also appear in the "Owned" section of the appropriate page.
还值得一提的是，你可以从市场找到第三方的教程和演示项目，一旦购买它们并添加到您的帐户，它们也将出现相应的页面的“已拥有”部分。
It is generally considered good practice in most cases to create one base parent object and have this base object contain all the default behaviour but never use an instance of it in the game.
在大多数情况下，通常认为创建一个基本父对象的良好做法，并且该基础对象包含所有默认行为，但不要在游戏中使用它的一个实例。

It is intended primarily as a tool for making 2D games - although 3D games are perfectly doable - and comes with a number of tools and editors to help you realise your dreams and ideas, with your final project being ported across multiple platforms from the same initial base resources.
它主要是用来制作2D游戏的工具，虽然制作3D游戏也是可行的。有许多工具和编辑器能帮助实现你的游戏想法，将您的最终项目从同样的初始基础资源移植到多个平台上。
It is off by default (and this is the recommended setting).
该选项默认为关（并且推荐为关）

默认情况下，它是打开的，但即使它是关闭的，你仍然可以使用房间编辑器适当的按钮再次启用它。

如果没有选择替代项，则它会被附加到所选文件中。

它首先会打开文件浏览器以便你选择要保存的位置，然后编译游戏。
It will only disappear when you explicitly destroy it, either with a destroy action or in code.
当您明确地销毁它时，它将只会消失，或者使用destroy操作或代码。
It will open the "Save" dialogue and prompt you to choose a location to save the new project to.
这会打开“保存（Save）”对话框并要求您选择存储新项目的位置。
It will reset the AudioGroup back to Default.
它会将音频组重置回默认。

有关这方面的更多信息，请参见<a3>物理学</a3>部分的下一页。

Most of the time they have a sprite associated with them so that you see them in the game rooms, but sometimes they are used as a "behind the scenes" controller to do things related to the user or for timing, etc...
大多数时候他们有一个与他们相关的精灵，以便您在游戏室看到他们，但有时候它们被用作“幕后”控制器来做与用户相关的事情或时间等...
Mouse down time to start dragging node (ms)
鼠标按下到开始拖动节点所需的时间(毫秒)

请将它移动到正确的位置。

接下来你可以选择你想要的对象的精灵。

没有可以预览声音的音频设备

tuv.seg: No matter what you select, you will then be prompted to choose a save location for the project and then it will be opened in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>.
无论你选择什么， 然后提示选择保存项目的位置，并在 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中打开。
No rooms found - you need at least one room to run.
没有房间 - 至少需要一个房间来运行

Normally most instances are visible but sometimes it is useful to have invisible ones - for example, you can use them for way-points to control a moving monster, or to keep track values and perform certain timed actions.
通常选择可见，但是有时不可见也是有用的。例如，可以使用点方式控制怪物移动，或者跟踪并进行一定的动作。
Normally used in conjunction with an argument array (<t1>argument[0...15]</t1>) to permit varying input arguments for a given script.
一般和参数数组（<t1>argument[0...15]</t1>）同用以允许对给定脚本输入数量可变的参数。

Normally you want it to be awake (ie: participating in the physics world) right from the start, but sometimes this can lead to certain instabilities and unwanted effects due to the abrupt start of the physics simulation.
通常你希望它从一开始就清醒（即：参与物理世界），但是由于物理模拟的突然启动，有时这可能会导致某些不稳定和不必要的影响。
Not expecting {0} {1} assigned in room {2} in instance {3}'s variable '{4}' (expected {5})
不期望在实例{3}的变量“{4}”（预期{5}）的房间{2}中分配{0} {1}
Not only can a child share code with its parent, but you can do checks and run code on parent objects and it will automatically include the child objects too, which saves a lot of time and energy.
孩子不仅可以与父母共享代码，而且可以在父对象上执行检查和运行代码，并且还会自动包含子对象，从而节省了大量的时间和精力。

Not only can you pass arguments into a script, but you can also ask a script to return a value too (using the <a0>Return</a0> <i1> action), so you can use them to (for example) build calculating methods or give back an instance ID after a complex collision detection or any number of things.
你不仅可以向脚本传递参数，你还可以要求脚本返回（Return）一个值（使用<a0>返回（Return）</a0>动作），因此你可以使用它们来（举个例子）构建一些计算方法或经过一系列复杂的碰撞检测之后反馈一个实例ID，又或者是其他的一些东西。
Note that a parent object doesn't have to have any events or code in it...
请注意，父对象不必在其中包含任何事件或代码...
Note that after changing any preferences from this window you need to click the <i3>Apply</i3> button for them to take effect.
请注意，从此窗口修改任何偏好设置你都需要点击<i3>应用（Apply）</i3>按钮来生效。

Note that both the optional "type" and the obligatory "description" parts of <t0>@param</t0> are not displayed by default in the IDE code complete, and to see them you must activate the options in the <a1>GML Preferences</a1>.
注意，在<t0>@param</t0>中无论是可写可不写的"type"还是还是必须写的"description"，在IDE的代码补全当中默认是都不显示的，如果想查看它们你必须在<a1>GML 偏好设置(GML Preference)</a1>中激活相应选项。
Note that clicking the help button <i1> in the menu bar will also open the document, as will pressing <i2>.
注意，在菜单条中点击帮助按钮<i1>或按下<i2>键也可以打开帮助文档。
Note that created variables in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> are all stored as double-precision floating point numbers, but you can use other formats when dealing with extensions.
请注意，在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中创建的变量都被存储为一个双精度浮点数，但是当使用扩展的时候你可以使用其他类型。

Note that currently <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> does not support "true" boolean values, and actually accepts any real number below 0.5 as a false value, and any real number equal to (or greater than) 0.5 as being true.
请注意，当前的<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>还不支持“真正的”布尔值，并且实际上是视所有低于0.5的实数为假（false），所有大于等于0.5的值为真（true）。
Note that downloading and installing a runtime can take a few minutes, but you can see a progress bar for the download at the top right of the IDE:
请注意，下载并安装运行环境需要几分钟，但是你可以在IDE的右上角看到一个进度条：
Note that if you are running <i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> on a macOS system and are using a single button mouse, please use <i8> + <i9> to get a right mouse click <i10>.
请注意，如果你在macOS系统上运行<i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> ，并且使用单按钮鼠标，请 <i8> + <i9> 获取鼠标右键单击 <i10>。

Note that installed tutorials and demos will have an additional icon <i0> which can be used to uninstall the project from your computer (this does <i1>not</i1> remove the tutorial or demo from your "Owned" list).
注意：安装教程和演示将有额外的图标 <i0> 可用于从您的计算机卸载该教程(它<i1>不会</i1>从你的 "已拥有" 列表里删除)。
Note that on Window 8 and above, the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE will support pen devices too.
请注意，在Windows 8或更高版本中，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>还会支持触控笔设备。
Note that on Windows 8 and above, the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE will support pen devices too.
请注意，在Windows 8或更高的系统上，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE还会支持触控笔设备。
Note that the YYC option will require extra setup.
请注意，YYC选项需要额外安装。
Note that the section on events above simply gives an overview of how they work, but for full details on all the avaialble events, please see the following section:
请注意，上面的事件部分简要概述了它们的工作原理，但是有关所有可用事件的详细信息，请参阅以下部分：
Note that there is also a section for <b0>Platform Specific Preferences</b0> which is listed in this section of the manual <a1>here</a1>.
请注意，还有一个部分叫做<b0>特定平台偏好设置（Platform Specific Preferences）</b0>被列举在手册的<a1>这个位置</a1>。
Note that there will also appear <b0>context specific</b0> menu options in the top menu bar, depending on the window that you have focused on currently.
请注意根据你目前焦点所在的窗口，顶部菜单栏还将出现 <b0>特定环境下的</b0>菜单选项。
Note that these are not mutually exclusive ways to make your games, and you can mix using GML with DnD™ as you wish, depending on your skill and requirements with either.
值得注意的是，制作游戏时它们相互之间并不排斥，你可以混合使用GML和DnD™，根据你的技能和要求，随心所愿。
Note that this checks to see if an object is present in the resource tree, and not actually in the game room.
请注意这个函数检查的是该物体是否出现在资源树中而非实际的游戏房间中。
Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Clean Cache</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.
注意这个命令和IDE的<b2>清理缓存</b2>按钮 <i3>是一样的。
Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Create Executable</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.
请注意这个命令和IDE中的 <b2>创建可执行文件</b2> 按钮 <i3>效果是一致的。
Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Debug</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.
注意这个命令和按下IDE的<b2>调试</b2> 按钮 <i3>是一样的。
Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Run</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.
请注意，这个命令和按下IDE的 <b2>运行</b2>按钮 <i3>效果是一样的。

Note that this is <i2>not</i2> the same as checking if two arrays are the same using ==, which will not check to see if the two arrays hold equivalent values, but only to see if the arrays are referencing the same initial array.
请注意，这并<i2>不</i2>与使用==来判断数组是否相同的方法完全一致，使用==判断的方法不会检测两个数组是否具有相同的值，而只会查看两个数组是否引用了同一个初始数组。
Note that this is not an exclusive DnD™ interface, and you can switch between DnD™ and GML code using the right mouse button <i5>.
请注意，这不是唯一的DND™访问接口，你可以切换 DnD™ 和 GML 代码，使用鼠标右键<i5>.
Note that this is not an exclusive GML interface, and you can switch between GML code and DnD™ using the right mouse button <i3>.
请注意，这不是唯一的GML访问接口，你可以切换 DnD™ 和 GML 代码，使用鼠标右键 <i3>.
Note that this will only restore the defaults for the section currently being edited.
请注意，这只会恢复当前正在编辑的部分。
Note that we assign the value <t0><b1>argument0</b1></t0> to a temporary variable at the start.
请注意，在开始的时候我们将值<t0><b1>argument0</b1></t0>赋给一个临时变量（Temporay Variable）

Note that when holding these buttons, you simply have to <i16>move</i16> the mouse - not click nor drag, just move - and that if there is a general shortcut that normally requires the use of the <i17> or <i18> keys, you would use the <i19>Right</i19> keys of the keyboard instead.
请注意，当按住这些键位的时候，你只需要<i16>移动</i16>鼠标即可——不需要点击也不需要拖拽——并且如果有一个常规的快捷键通常要求是哟个<i17>或<i18>键的时候，你可以改用键盘上的<i19>右边</i19>的相应键位。

Note that when using DnD™ or GML code you can also select an action or a function (or keyword or whatever) and then press <i0> or click the middle mouse button <i1> to open the manual on the relevant page.
请注意，当使用DnD™按钮或GML代码，你也可以选择一个动作或一个函数（再或者是一个关键字或者是别的什么东西），然后按下<i0>或者点击鼠标中键<i1>来在本帮助手册中打开相关页面。

Note that while working through a tutorial you can save the project at any time and close the IDE or even change projects without worrying about losing your place, since tutorials will store the page and section that you are currently working through every time you save the project.
请注意，使用一个教程进行创作时，你可以随时保存工程并关闭IDE甚至改变工程，而无需担心失去你的当前位置，因为教程会保存该页面和你每次保存时正在创作的部分。

tu.note: 这部分需要重译 - deciia

tuv.seg: Note that you will need to have previously installed the required runtimes which is done from the section below the settings for the current runtime:
请注意，你将需要预先安装必要的运行库，这些是在当前运行库下面的部分完成的：

Note too that a persistent object will still have its Game Start, Game End, Room Start and Room End events triggered, however if you restart the game (with, for example, the game_restart() function) all persistent objects will be removed and only exist when created again by the game.
还要注意，持久化对象仍然会触发游戏开始，游戏结束，房间开始和房间结束事件，但是如果您重新启动游戏（例如，使用game_restart（）函数），则所有持久对象将被删除在游戏再次创建时存在。
Notes can also be grouped and re-ordered like any other resource.
和其他资源一样，便签也可以被编组或调换顺序。
Notice in the above example we use another enum to create an expression for "violet".
请注意，上面的例子中我们使用了另一个枚举为"violet"创建了一个表达式。
Now what does this mean in binary?
那么，二进制里这意味着什么？
Now, if I were to do this without understanding binary, it would look like this:
现在，如果我不理解二进制方法的话，代码会变成这样：
Now, the sharp-sighted amongst you might have noticed we've used both here (as is so often the case), but this is still only a couple of instructions.
现在，一些思维敏锐的人就会察觉到，我们在此处两种方法都使用了（这也是常有的情况），但是，它仍然只是一组指令。

Now, we say "based on" because you don't actually place objects directly into the game rooms, but rather you place <b0>instances</b0> of these objects which are basically copies (or clones if you prefer) of the object resource.
现在,我们说“基于”因为你没对象直接进入游戏房间,而是你把< b0 > < / b0 >的这些对象实例基本上是副本(或如果你喜欢克隆)对象的资源。
Now, when calling this script in code anywhere, you will get auto-complete and argument help etc...
现在，在其他任意位置的代码中调用该脚本的时候，就会有自动补全以及参数提示等信息了。
Now, when you place these instances in a room they will all behave the same, but look different, since they will "inherit" the events of the parent.
现在，当你把这些实例放在一个房间里时，它们都会表现得相同，但是看起来是不同的，因为他们会“继承”父项的事件。

Now, you want the player to die if he touches any of these four objects and this would normally entail four different collision events with four different sets of actions or code, one for each of the enemy objects.
现在，如果他触摸到这四个对象中的任何一个，你想要玩家死亡，这通常会导致四个不同的碰撞事件与四个不同的动作或代码集合，一个对于每个敌对象。

tu.note: 默认的翻译是数论，然而此处是解释二进制运算的逻辑，用纯数学专业术语，一般的开发者还需要二次查找才会了解“数论”的含义，此处推荐直接翻译“数字理论”。

tuv.seg: 物体编辑器的手势事件
对象编辑器物理形状编辑器
对象编辑器物理形状类型
物体编辑器的偏好设置
Object double click opens all object events
双击物体打开所有物体的事件
Object has been released too many times
Objects are the resource that we use to control aspects of a game and to do specific things.
物体是一个用来控制游戏各方面的具体事件的特殊资源。

Obviously you can't create a cycle of "parent 1 is child of parent 2 is child of parent 1" but you can create what is called "object hierarchy" where "parent1 is child of parent2 is child of parent3".
显然，你不能创建一个循环“父1是父2的孩子是父1的子”，但是您可以创建一个所谓的“对象层次结构”，其中“parent1是parent2的子代是parent3的子代”。
Okay, we can use an array for those things mentioned above, but what is an array?
好了，我们可以用数组做到上面提到的那些事情，那么数组究竟是啥呢？
Okay... so actually this would be bit 26 the way I've been describing things so far (as bits have been starting at one), but actually... bits start at bit 0, and go upwards, not at bit 1.
好吧……因此实际上以我目前所描述的方法（我是假装位是从1开始的）会设置26号位，但实际上是从0号位开始的并向上递增的，而非1号位。
On all operating systems you can use the touch screen to click and drag items in the main workspace, and we support 2 simultaneous pointers, where a second tap will perform a right-click.
在所有操作系统上你都可以使用触控屏点击或拖拽项目到主工作区里，并且我们支持两个同时存在的触控来表示右键。
On the left above is the parent object with 5 events in it, and on the right you can see the "child" object.
在左上方是其中有5个事件的父对象，右边可以看到“child”对象。
On the left of the start page you can see a list of previous projects that you can open.
在起始页的左侧你可以看见你所能打开的过去的项目。
On the left we have four separate collision events and on the right we have a single collision event, as we have created a "parent" object and assigned all the enemy objects to it.
在左边，我们有四个单独的碰撞事件，右边我们有一个碰撞事件，因为我们创建了一个“父”对象，并分配了所有的敌方对象。
Once a Runtime Feed has been created it will be listed in this section as a sub-category, and you should always have at least one feed listed (by default this would be the Master feed).
一旦创建了一个运行库下载源，它将作为子类别在这个部分列出，你应该始终至少列出一个下载源（默认是主下载源）。

Once a tutorial or demo has been installed, it's simply a case of clicking on it to open it and you will be prompted to provide a location to save the tutorial project to before the IDE opens for you to begin.
一旦教程或演示项目已经安装，你可以点击打开它，选择保存位置，之后在IDE中打开这个教程。
Once installed and the first time you run <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>, you may be prompted to update before being able to use the product.
一经安装后首次运行<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>，你可能会在使用产品前被提示升级。
Once registered and logged in, the main <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> IDE will open on the <b4>Start Page</b4>:
一旦注册，登录，<i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> IDE 主界面将打开<b4>起始页（Start Page）</b4>：
Once the Preferences window is open you will have the following different options:
一旦偏好设置窗口打开，你会有如下的各种选项：
Once the keyboard is hidden, a System event of type "keyboard status" is raised.
隐藏键盘后，会引发类型为“键盘状态”的系统事件。
Once the keyboard is shown, a System event of type "keyboard status" is raised.
显示键盘后，将引发类型为“键盘状态”的系统事件。
Once the tutorial or demo is in the "Owned" section, you can mouse over it and either install it or view the information on it from the Marketplace:
一旦教程出现在 "已拥有（Owned）" 部分，当鼠标在某个教程之上时，会显示它的信息说明。

Once you have done that, the new file and password will be automatically added into the form fields listed above and you can click on the <b2>Check</b2> button to test that the certificate has been generated correctly.
一旦做完，新文件和密码将会自动添加上面列表的窗口字段中，然后你可以点击 <b2>检测（Check）</b2> 按钮测试是否已经正确的生成证书。
Once you have downloaded and installed GameMaker Studio 2, the first time you use it you will be requested to input your licence details:
一旦你下载并安装了GameMaker Studio 2，首次使用你会被要求输入你的许可信息：
Once you have given a name to the project and a location to save it, you will be taken to a new, blank, <a2>workspace</a2> to start working on it.
一旦您已经给定了项目的名字及存储位置，您就会被带到一个新的、空白的<a2>工作区（Workspace）</a2>来开始创作。
Once you have selected your event, the <a2>code window</a2> will be chained to it and open up on the right.
选择您的活动后，<a2>代码窗口</a2>将被链接到右侧并打开。
Once you have set up your shape, you then need to define the basic physical properties that your object is to have.
一旦你设置了你的形状，你需要定义你的对象的基本物理属性。

Once you have your images it's simply a question of assigning them to objects in the <b5>Object Editor</b5>, adding some code or DnD™ actions, and then placing instances of these objects into a game room in the <b6>Room Editor</b6>.
有了图片之后，在 <b5>物体编辑器</b5>绑定到物体上就是简单的问题了，添加一些代码或 DnD™ 动作，然后将物体的实例放进 <b6>房间编辑器</b6>的游戏房间里。

Once you select the desired runtime to use, the details will be shown in the section and when you click <i0>Apply</i0> you will be prompted to clsoe and restart the IDE so that the new runtime can be initialised.
一直你选择所需使用的运行库后，在这部分你将看到详细信息，当你点击<i0>应用</i0>你将被提示关闭并重启IDE，以便初始化新的运行库。
Once you've got to grips with the basics you can then move on to the more in-depth look at the components of <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> in the <a3>Interface</a3> section below.
一旦你掌握了基本的知识，你便可以再深入看看 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>的各个元件，它们 在下面的 <a3>界面</a3>部分。
One final thing we'll mention here is that the IDE for <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> also has minimal support for touch screens.
最后我们这里要说的就是<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>的IDE还有一些对于触控屏的支持。
One of the resources in the <b0>Resource Tree</b0> is the <b1>Script</b1> resource.
<b0>资源树</b0>中有一种资源叫做<b1>脚本（Script）</b1>

说你有一个“玩家”对象和四个不同的“敌人”对象。

Say you want two monsters: one that moves up and down, while another that moves left and right, but you also want the two of them to have the same health, shoot at the player and hurt the player if they collide with them.
假设你想要两个怪物：一个上下移动，另一个是左右移动，但是你也希望他们中的两个人具有相同的健康，在玩家身上射击，并且如果与他们碰撞，伤害到玩家。
Scripts are exactly the same, with the only difference being that <i0>you</i0> write them.

Scripts are simply blocks of code or DnD™ actions that are executed as if they were one of the built in <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> functions or actions.

So - OR (|), AND(&), NOT(~) and EOR(^) let us manipulate bits with relative ease, allowing us, at the simplest level, to control multiple bits at once.
所以 - 或 (|)、 与(&)、 非(~) 以及异或(^) 让我们可以相对容易的操作位运算，允许我们在一个最简单的层面上一次性同时控制多个位。
So actually not that complex really.
所以其实没有那么复杂，真的。
So adding a 1+1 means we overflow into 10.
所以 1+1 means we overflow into 10.
So bit 2 = 2, bit 3 = 4, bit 4 = 8 and so on (as shown below in this <i2>byte</i2> table - a byte being a collection of 8 bits):
所以2号位 = 2，3号位 = 4，4号位 = 8等等（如下所示，在这个 <i2>字节</i2>表中 - 一个字节是8位的集合）：
So even if bit 1 was already set, the operation still works and bit 3 will now also be set.<br0>
所以，当1号位已经被设置的时候，该操作对3号位依然有效并且也会同样被设置.<br0>

tu.note: 待校正

tuv.seg: So if had a value of 1000111011 and I wanted to clear bits 1 and 3 using the mask above, I would end up with this...
再比如我们有一个值“1000111011”，我们想要清理位1和位3，使用上面的掩码，我将用这个结束这个操作：
So if you can pack all yours flags down into a single memory access, this is good!
所以如果你能把你所有的标记都打包成单一的内存通道，那是极好的！
So let's look at the most basic binary theory first - how numbers are created.
所以，我们先看一下最基础的二进制理论 - 数字是怎样创建的。
So let's say Bit 27 is an active flag, and bit 0 is an exploding flag.
那么假设27号位是一个活动标记，0号位是一个爆炸标记。So let's say Bit 27 is an active flag, and bit 0 is an exploding flag.
So there you shift the single bit <i0>down</i0> by 5 (which is the number of shifts required for 32 – look above), which gives us 2.
所以，这里你是向<i0>低阶</i0>移动单个位5个位数（这也是要得到32时需要移动的位数——见上文），就会给我们一个2.
So this happily lets us set and clear any bits we'd like, and it also lets us compress out data structures massively.
所以，这让我们很方便地设置并清空我们需要的任意位，并且它也可以让我们很大幅度地压缩数据结构。
So to avoid any issues you are best not to call multiple functions in the arguments of a function call as you may well be building in a reliance on the order of evaluation.

因此为了避免可能发生的任何问题，你最好不要在参数里调用大量的函数。So to avoid any issues you are best not to call multiple functions in the arguments of a function call as you may well be building in a reliance on the order of evaluation.
So what exactly does the binary OR operator do?
所以二进制“或”运算符究竟是做什么的呢？
So when we talk about something affecting or changing an instance, we mean it affects that <i3>one particular copy of an object in a room</i3>.
所以当我们谈论影响或改变一个实例的东西时，我们的意思是它会影响一个房间</i3>中一个对象的特定副本。
So where there is a value with 2 zeros, it'll stay zero.
所以两个零的值仍然保持零。
So while there are 32 bits in an INTEGER, the bits range from 0 to 31, not 1 to 32.
所以，当一个整型数中有32位的时候，它的位域是从0到31号位，而非1到32号位。
So why is this much worse?
So, 124, 45639.566546456, 0, -45.5 etc... are all examples of real numbers.
So, a balloon would have a low density as it has little mass that occupies a large space, while a lead bar would have a high density as it has a great mass, yet occupies little space.
所以气球的密度很小，因为它的质量很小，占据很大的空间，而铅棒的密度很高，因为它的质量很大，而且空间很小。
So, again, we can make one object the parent of the other, but in this case we also define certain events for the child object.
因此，我们可以使一个对象成为另一个对象的父对象，但在这种情况下，我们也定义子对象的某些事件。
So, every object in your game project can have a parent object, but what does this mean?
所以，游戏项目中的每个对象都可以有一个父对象，但这是什么意思？
So, if you select a function, for example, all instances of this function in the current code window will be highlighted too.
所以，例如，如果你选中一个函数，当前代码窗口所有此函数的实例也都会高亮。
So, only when there is a bit in each place will it be kept.
所以，每个位置都有1的地方将保留。
So, the object is the template for the instance, and the instance is what we place in a room to make our game.
所以，对象是实例的模板，实例是我们在一个房间里进行我们的游戏。
So, what if we wanted the remainder?
那么，如果我们想要获取余数该怎么办呢？
So, when two instances collide, their motion is affected by this value, with a high friction causing a larger loss of momentum than a lower value.
所以当两个实例碰撞时，它们的运动受到这个值的影响，摩擦力会比较低的值导致更大的动量损失。
So, when using expressions in your code, ensure you use brackets () to properly control the order of operations.
因此在代码中使用表达式的时候，请确保合理使用圆括号来控制运算符顺序。

So, you can name the script one thing in the resource tree and name it as another using <t2>@function</t2> and the IDE will recognise <i3>both</i3> as alias of the same script resource, but only the <t4>@function</t4> one will have auto-complete, etc...

这是对象可以响应的所有基本事件的列表，尽管其中一些事件还具有<b0>子事件</b0>以进一步改进行为。

节点 "{0}" 正导致无效的程序流。

tuv.seg: The 2013 system has been deprecated by Microsoft and should only be used for titles already in development \nThe 2017 system no longer requires a service manifest \nPlease see Microsoft documentation for more details
2013年系统已被Microsoft弃用，只应用于已在开发的标题\n 2017系统不再需要服务清单\n请参阅Microsoft文档了解更多详细信息
The <b0>Colour</b0> preferences are used to change how the code and script editor display different texts.
<b0>颜色</b0>偏好设置用于更改代码和脚本编辑器如何显示不同的文本。
The <b0>Confirm Dialogs</b0> preferences are used to change the messages that are shown in the room editor when you perform certain actions.
<b0>确认对话框</b0>偏好设置用于更改房间编辑器执行某些操作时消息框设置。
The <b0>Drag and Drop</b0> Preferences are used to define how the Drag and Drop script editor looks and feels.
<b0>拖拽按钮</b0>设置用于定义拖拽按钮脚本编辑器看起来是什么样子。
The <b0>Expression</b0> input field is for you to input the ID of a specific instance that you want the action to work on.
<b0>表达式（Expression）</b0>输入字段供你输入一个你希望执行动作的实例id。
The <b0>Extension Editor</b0> Preferences cover a few options related to the messages that you are shown when using it, with the exact details outlined below:
<b0>扩展编辑器</b0>的偏好设置涵盖了一些和使用它时显示的信息有关的选项，具体有下面几个：
The <b0>General Preferences</b0> are used to define the general behaviour of the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE.
<b0>常规偏好设置</b0> 被用于定义<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE的常规行为。
The <b0>Grid Settings</b0> preferences are used to change how the grid overlay works, with the following options available:
<b0>网格设置（Grid Settings）</b0> 偏好设置用来更改网格覆盖的工作方式，有下面可用的选项：
The <b0>Image Editor Preferences</b0> are used to define how the sprite and <a1>image editor</a1> windows look and feel.
<b0>图像编辑器偏好设置（Image Editor Preferences）</b0>被用于定义精灵和<a1>图像编辑器（Image Editor）</a1>窗口的外观和感受。
The <b0>Language Preferences</b0> are used to define how some of the language features for programming will be displayed in the IDE of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> .
<b0>语言偏好设置（Language Preferences）</b0>被用于定义编程时的一些语言特性将会被如何显示在<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的IDE中。
The <b0>Marketplace Preferences</b0> are used to set up the Marketplace Certificate for uploading or buying assets.
The <b0>市场偏好设置（Marketplace Preferences）</b0>可以建立在市场上用于上传或购买资源的市场证书（Marketplace Certificate）。
The <b0>Master</b0> Runtime Feed preferences are used to select, install and un-install the different runtime tools (this page will be the same too for any further runtime feeds that you have added).
<b0>主</b0>运行库下载源偏好设置用于选择、安装或者卸载不同的运行库工具（此页对于你添加的任何其它的运行库下载源也都是一样的）。
The <b0>Object Editor Preferences</b0> are used to define certain properties for the <a1>object editor</a1> window.
<b0>物体编辑器偏好设置</b0> 用于定义<a1>物体编辑器</a1>窗口的特定属性。
The <b0>Plugins Preferences</b0> are used to control any extra plugins that have been added to the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE.
<b0>插件偏好设置</b0>用于控制已经添加到<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE的任何额外的插件。

The <b0>Preferences Window</b0> is an essential part of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>, as it is where you can set up and customise your experience using the IDE as well as set up any specific platform SDK's etc...
<b0>偏好设定窗口</b0> 是 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的一个重要的组成部分，因为在这里你能够设置并自定义你的IDE使用体验还可以设置任意平台的SDK等……

tu.note: 此处翻译待斟酌。

tuv.seg: The <b0>Resource Tree Preferences</b0> are used to define certain properties for how the resource tree and it's elements function.
<b0>资源树偏好设置</b0>用于为资源树和它的元件定义某些属性。
The <b0>Room Editor Preferences</b0> are used to define how the <a1>room editor</a1> will look and behave.
<b0>房间编辑器偏好设置</b0>用于定义<a1>房间编辑器</a1>的外观和感受。
The <b0>Runtime Feeds Preferences</b0> are used to display and change the currently installed runtimes as well as the runtime in current use.
<b0>运行库下载源偏好设置</b0>用来显示或更改当前已安装的运行库，也包括当前正在使用的运行库。

The <b0>Spline Editor</b0> Preferences are used primarily to define how the <a1>path editor</a1> looks and feels, although they will affect certain other aspects of the IDE (like the physics shape editor).
<b0>样条曲线编辑器</b0>偏好设置主要用来定义<a1>路径编辑器</a1>的外观和感受，尽管也将会影响IDE的特定的其它方面（比如物理形状编辑器）。
The <b0>Sprite Editor</b0> Preferences are used to define how the <a1>sprite editor</a1> looks and functions.
<b0>精灵编辑器</b0> 偏好设置用来定义<a1>精灵编辑器</a1>的外观和功能。
The <b0>Text Editors Preferences</b0> are used to define how the different <a1>code/script editors</a1> look and feel.
<b0>文本编辑器偏好设置</b0>用来定义不同的<a1>代码/脚本编辑器</a1>的外观和感受。
The <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE (integrated development environment) has a number of advanced options that are of great importance if you wish to get the most out of the product.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 的IDE （集成开发环境）拥有大量的高级选项，对于想要获得最大化的产品，它们都具有重要的意义。
The <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE accepts mouse and keyboard input, and many operations can be carried out using one or the other or both.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>的IDE接受鼠标和键盘输入，并且你可以选择一个或另一个或者两者都用来实现更多操作。
The <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE will periodically check for updates and then download them automatically.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE会定期要求你检查更新，然后会自动下载。
The Amazon Fire Android SDK path is misconfigured
Amazon Fire Android SDK 路径配置错误
The Android SDK path is misconfigured
Android SDK 路径配置错误
The Background preferences deal with the Workspace background and what it will display as well as how it will be displayed.
背景偏好设置用于处理工作区的背景、显示什么背景以及背景如何去显示。
The Compiling preferences deal with certain options related to the output when compiling your game for testing or creating a package, as well as certain areas of the compiling process.
编译器偏好设置用于处理某些在编译游戏以测试或创建程序包时和输出及编译处理的某些方面有关的选项。
The Confirm Dialogue preferences deal with some of the general confirmation pop-ups that will appear when performing certain actions in the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE.
确认对话框偏好设置用于处理一些在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE中执行某些动作时的常规弹窗确认信息。
无法找到当前的程序包。
The DLL {0} on extension {1} with function {2} has more than 4 arguments and are not all the same type.
扩展名为{1}且函数为{2}的DLL {0}具有4个以上的参数，并且类型不同。
The Event cannot be changed to an existing Event.
事件无法更改为现有事件。
The Free version has certain limitations but permits you to test out the most important features and prototype projects.
试用版具有一些限制但是允许你体验我们最重要的特性和样例工程。
The Grid Settings preferences are used to set how the image grid will be presented, with the following options available:
网格偏好设置（Grid Settings preferences ）被用于设置图像网格会如何显示，有如下可用选项：
图片编辑器的背景设置
图像编辑器的确认设置
The Image Editor Grid Settings Preferences
图像编辑器的网格设置
图像编辑器的偏好设置
The Image Editor Preferences also has the following sub-categories:
图像编辑器偏好设置中还有如下的子目录：
图像编辑器的工具设置
The Input preferences control certain aspects of the mouse and keyboard input within the IDE.
输入偏好设置用于控制IDE中某些需要鼠标和键盘输入方面的控制。
The NOT operator is just what it says - NOT those bits.
“非”运算就像它说的一样 - “非”那些位。
The NX CPU Profiler can only be used on YYC builds.
NX CPU Profiler 只能用于YYC构建。
The NX CPU Profiler should not be enabled for Packaged builds
程序包构建时无法启用 NX CPU Profiler
The Object Editor Confirm Dialog Preferences
物体编辑器确认对话框偏好设置
The Output Window preferences control the different colour and formatting options for the various different output windows in the IDE.
输出窗口偏好设置控制着IDE中各个输出窗口的各种颜色和格式。
The Path preferences control the different file paths required by elements in the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE as well as for any external editors that you require.
文件路径偏好设置（Path Preference）用于控制<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中的一些要素以及你所要求的外部编辑器（External Editors）所需的各种文件路径。

The Power Saving preferences here will affect how much CPU power and GPU power will be used to generate the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE (essentially this will lower the base framerate at which the program runs and so lower power consumption).
节能偏好设置（Power Saving Preferences）将会影响生成<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE所使用的CPU及GPU功率（必要时这些设置会在程序运行时降低基本帧率及功耗）。
The Projects section is where you can create, open or import projects.
你可以在工程部分创建、打开或导入项目。
The Repository '{0}' is expecting a different Username/Password than is set under the Identity preferences.
存储库 '{0}' 期望一个与身份偏好设置不同的用户名/密码。
The Repository is expecting a different Username/Password than is set under the Identity preferences.
项目库需要一个与标识设置(?)不同的用户名/密码。
The Resource Tree Confirm Dialog Preferences
资源树确认对话框偏好设置
The Room Editor Confirm Dialogs Preferences
房间编辑器确认对话框偏好设置
The Room Editor Grid Settings Preferences
房间编辑器网格设置偏好
运行库主下载源偏好设置
运行库下载源偏好设置

样条曲线编辑器偏好设置
The Sprite Editor Confirm Dialog Preferences
精灵编辑器确认对话框偏好设置
文本编辑器颜色偏好设置
The Texture Group for sprite '{0}' is invalid - setting to Default Texture Group instead
精灵纹理组 '{0}' 无效 - 使用默认纹理组代替
The Trial Licence has certain limitations but permits you to test out the most important features and prototype projects.
试用版具有一些限制但是允许你体验我们最重要的特性和样例工程。
The URL or IP to connect to (a string).
待连接的URL或IP（字符串形式）。
The URL to get the IP of (a string).

The UWP target comes with two compile options, one is the <b0>VM</b0> that uses a runner and interpreted code and the other which is the <b1>YYC</b1> (YoYo Compiler) which creates native code and a compiled executable.
UWP 平台带有两个编译选项，一个是 <b0>VM（虚拟机）</b0> ，它使用一个运行器来解释代码，另一个是 <b1>YYC</b1>（YoYo 编译器） ，创建本机代码并编译可执行程序。
The Web Server will show a certain amount of debug information related to the files that have been served, and has a button to clear this at the bottom.
这个网络服务器会显示一定量的与所伺服文件相关的调试信息，以及底部的一个用来清空这些信息的按钮。
The above code checks the variable "val" to see if it contains a pointer and if it does not then one is assigned to it.
上述代码将会检测变量“val”来观察它是否存储一个指针，如果不是则将一个指针赋予给它。
The above code gets the hue used to make the colour constant "c_teal" and then merges it with white at a 50:50 ratio, storing the resulting colour in the variable "col".
上述代码获取颜色常量 "c_teal"的色相，然后将其与白色按照50:50的比例混合，并且将混合后的新颜色储存到变量 "col"中。
The above code stores the current action number in the variable "num".
上述代码将当前所执行动作的索引存入变量“num”中。
The above code stores the current x axis window position of the mouse in the variable "wx".
上述代码使用变量"wx"记录了鼠标在窗口中的x轴位置。
The above code stores the current y axis window position of the mouse in the variable "wy".
上述代码使用变量"wy"记录了鼠标在窗口中的y轴位置。
The above code uses the <t0>argument_count</t0> variable to initialize variables, and is an example of how to permit a script to accept a variable number of arguments.
上述代码使用<t0>argument_count</t0>变量来初始化变量，并示范了如何允许脚本接收可变数量的参数。
The above code will burst a random number of particles between 30 and 60 from the chosen emitter.
上述代码会从所选发射器迸发30到60个随机数量的粒子。
The above code will check to see if a global variable exists and if it does then it is output to the console.
上述代码会检测一个全局变量是否存在，若存在将其输出到控制台上。
The above code will check to see if the game window is in focus or not, and if the function returns <t0>false</t0> a script will be called.
上述代码将会检测游戏窗口是否处于焦点，若为<t0>false</t0>则调用一个脚本。
The above code will check to see if the global variable called "enemy_num" exists and if it does not it is created and set a value.
上述代码将会检测名字叫"enemy_num"的全局变量是否存在，如果不存在则创建这样的全局变量并为其设定一个值。
The above code will check two arrays to see if they hold equivalent values, and if they do not then the code will copy the entire contents of the array "inventory_array" to the array "item_array".
上述代码将会检测两个数组来查看它们是否承载了相等的值，如果不是，这段代码将会拷贝数组"inventory_array"的全部内容给数组"item_array"。
The above code will clear the particle emitter indexed in the variable "p_emit1".
上述代码将会清空索引为变量“p_emit1”的粒子发射器。
The above code will create a new TCP socket then attempt to connect through that to the given IP address on port 6510.
上述代码会新建一个TCP套接字然后尝试通过之去连接指定的IP地址的6510端口。
The above code will create a new array of 100 entries, each one set to the keyword <t0>noone</t0>, and then assign it to the variable "instance_array".
上述代码将会创建一个具有100个元素的新书组，每个新数组会被赋予一个关键字<t0>noone</t0>，然后将整个数组赋给变量"instance_array"。
The above code will create an identity matrix and store its index in a variable for future use.
上述代码将会创建一个单位矩阵并将其索引存入一个变量中以供日后使用。
The above code will delete the font indexed in the global variable "Font".
上述代码会删除索引为全局变量“Font”的字体。
The above code will get the green component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "g_comp".
上述代码将会返回颜色常量“c_teal”的绿色分量，并将该值存储与变量“g_comp”中。
The above code will get the red component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "r_comp".
上述代码获取颜色常量 "c_teal"的红色分量，并且将其储存到变量 "r_comp"中。
The above code will loop through a 2D array and set each entry to -1.
上述代码将会遍历该二维数组并将每一元素设为-1。
The above code will return the IP address of the given URL and store it in the variable "game_ip".
上述代码将会返回所指定的URL的IP地址并将其存入变量“game_ip”中。
The above code will set the timeout for the network connection to 1000ms and tell GameMaker Studio 2 not to block on connect.

The default is to show you a warning message and let you decide what to do, but you can set it to "Delete All" to suppress the message and go ahead with the item delete from the parent room and all its children, or you can select "Keep All" to suppress the message abort the delete.
默认是显示一个警告消息，让你决定要做什么，但是你可以设置为“删除所有（Delete All）”来禁止这个消息，并继续从父房间和它所有的子房间删除这个项目，或者你可以选择“保留所有（Keep All）”来禁止消息并中止删除。

There are a huge number of keyboard shortcuts available for GameMaker Studio 2, and although most of them are marked in the IDE beside the menu items that they relate too, not all of them are or are obvious to the user at the start.
在GameMaker Studio 2有很多可供使用的键盘快捷键，并且尽管它们当中的绝大多数在IDE中相关菜单项的旁边被标注出来了，但对于用户来说并不是所有快捷键在开始的时候很显眼。

There are also a great number of keyboard shortcuts that can be used to navigate around the different workspace elements and resource editors, and although you can find a complete list <a0>here</a0> we'll quickly go through some of the most important ones:

There will be certain instances in a physics based game which you want to move around but do not wish to be acted on by forces such as gravity, nor forces incurred by collisions with dynamic objects (think of moving platforms in a platform game, for example).
基于物理的游戏将会有一些你想要移动的实例，但不希望被诸如重力等力量所影响，也不希望与动态对象碰撞所产生的力量（例如，在平台游戏中考虑移动平台）。

然而今 天，甚至是使用最普通的PC，你也不再需要了解这些东西，或者走一个很长的路，机器的速度和结构复杂的CPU将弥补这种方法的任何缺点。

These events "override" the parent events, meaning that whenever an event for the child object contains actions, these are executed instead of the actions contained in the event of the parent.
这些事件“覆盖”父事件，这意味着每当一个子对象的事件包含操作时，这些事件将被执行，而不是父事件中包含的操作。

可以将这些可执行文件配置在三个UWP平台之一运行：

These options include source control integration, project configurations, advanced debugging and a number of extra tools for changing and manipulating the game assets (please note that the availability of some of these advanced tools will depend on the <a1>version of <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2></a1> that you currently use).
这些选项包括源代码控制集成，项目配置，先进的调试，以及更改和操作资源的额外工具（请注意这些高级工具的可用于取决于当前使用 <a1>版本 <i2>的GameMaker Studio 2</i2></a1>）。

These pages are designed to be informative and help the user understand some of the concepts behind programming in general as well as how to get the most from <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>, and as such it is recommended that you have some experience using the product before reading.
这些页面被设计为资料性质，帮助用户理解一般编程背后的一些概念，以及更深刻的理解<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>，为此建议你有一些使用这个产品的经验之后再来阅读。

这些工具主要是不同平台要求的运行器和编译器，并且实际上你能同时拥有多个这些东西。
These variables cannot be edited (neither their name nor their path/setting) but you can select and copy/paste any of them for use elsewhere.
这些变量不能被编辑（名字和路径/设定都不可以），但是你可以选取复制它们并可以将其粘贴到别的地方以供使用。
They can be given behaviours and they can react to certain events as well as to each other, and most of the things you see in a game are based on objects and their interactions.
他们可以给予行为和对某些事件做出反应以及彼此,和你在游戏看到的大多数事情都是基于对象和他们的相互作用。
This <b0>read-only</b0> variable returns the number of "arguments" that are passed through to a script.
该<b0>只读</b0>变量返回传递给脚本的参数个数。

This account holds all your licence details for the YoYo Games products that you own, and is also used for the <a2>YoYo Games Marketplace</a2>.
你的账户承载着你的所拥有的全部YoYo Games产品的许可信息并且也被用于<a2>YoYo Games 市场</a2>。
This addon requires the Amazon Fire or Mobile licences.\nDo you want to go to your account to check your availability of these?
此附加组件需要 Amazon Fire 或 移动版本(Mobile) 许可证。\n您是否要转到您的帐户检查这些的可用性？
This adds up, especially if you're doing a tight loop with lots of calculations like this.
当这些累加起来，特别是你在对一个像这样很紧张的，带有很多运算的循环当中的时候。

This array can then be passed through to scripts and functions on a pass-by-reference basis, however should you modify the passed array, it will then become a copy of the original array and so will need to be returned back to the original variable for the array to be updated.
通过传引用（Pass-by-reference）可以将这个数组传递给脚本或函数中，但是当你要修改所传递的数组的时候，它会变成原来数组的一个拷贝（Copy），因此你需要回到原来需要修改的数组中。
This asset hasn't received enough reviews yet.
这个资源还没有收到足够的评论。
This avoids the need to do a floating point divide, and then a floor( ) calculation – which all adds up.<br0>
这很好地避免了使用浮点数除法然后在用floor()向下取整计算一起进行的必要。<br0>
This can be a positive or negative value from -128 to 127 (0 is classed as positive).
值域为-128到127的正值和负值（0被归类为正值）。
This child only has 2 events defined, but it will inherit the events of the parent and so have 5, exactly the same.
这个孩子只定义了2个事件，但它会继承父进程的事件，所以有5个完全一样。
This constant indicates that the pointer is not pointing to anything meaningful (the same as <t0>NULL</t0> in C++ or null in C#)
该常量表示指针没有指向一个地址（空地址）（和C++中的<t0>NULL</t0>或C#中的null一样）
This constant simply means that the value is not a valid pointer
该常量表示该值不是一个有效的指针。
This depth is incremented by the amount given here.
深度的增加量根据上面给定的的值来确定。

This document is divided into three parts with the aim of getting you introduced to the interface and basic workings of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> before going on to more advanced usage and the functions available through our propriety scripting language <a2>GML</a2> or our visual scripting tool <a3>Drag and Drop</a3>.
本文档分为三个部分，目的是让你熟悉<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>界面和基本的工作方式，然后是高级的用法和适合我们的脚本语言<a2>GML</a2>的函数用法，或者虚拟的脚本工具<a3>拖拽（Drag and Drop，简称DnD）。</a3>.

This does <i3>not</i3> mean however that you should be checking 1 and 0 (or any other real number) for true and false, as you are also provided with the <b4>constants</b4> <t5>true</t5> and <t6>false</t6> which should always be used in your code to prevent any issues should real boolean data types be added in a future update.
然而，这也<i3>不</i3>意味着你应该使用1或0（或者别的实数）来进行检测真假，因此还提供了<b4>常量</b4><t5>true</t5>和<t6>false</t6>，你应该总是使用它们以防止在未来的更新中引入真正的布尔数据类型时可能引发的问题。
This extension has no exported functions
该扩展没有导出的函数
This feature only works when the function has been selected from the autocomplete.
这个特性只有在自动补全开启时才有效。
This feed will then be scanned for updates to the runtime tools which can then be downloaded and installed.
这个下载源将扫描更新运行库，然后可以下载并安装。

此字体缺少一个或多个符号，将从其他字体中获取替换。

该函数将会返回指定URL的IP地址。

这个函数将返回给定颜色的色相。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has been flagged as "physics enabled", returning <t0>true</t0>, or not, returning <t1>false</t1>.
该函数会告诉你所检查的物体是否被标记为“启用物理的物体”，若是则返回<t0>true</t0>否则返回<t1>false</t1>。
This graph shows frames per second and memory usage over time.\nHold Control and scroll to expand and contract the graph.
此图显示每秒帧数和随时间的内存使用情况。\n按住Control并滚动以展开和收缩图形。
This graph shows frames per second and memory usage over time.\nHold ⌘ and scroll to expand and contract the graph.
此图显示每秒帧数和随时间变化的内存使用情况。\n按住⌘并滚动以展开和收缩图形。
This happens when, in an action, you indicate that the action must be applied to instances of a certain object.
当在一个动作中，您指出该操作必须应用于某个对象的实例时，会发生这种情况。
This help file will tell you all you need to know about <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> and how you can create your own games with it.
这个帮助文件将告诉你关于 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>所有你需要知道的东西，以及你怎样在创建你的游戏时使用它们。.

This is a <i2>very</i2> basic functionality, and in reality all it does is move the instance back to the position it was in the moment before a collision was detected before performing any code or DnD™ that is in the event itself, and as such is of limited use.
这是一个<i2>非常</i2>基本功能，实际上所有这些都是将实例移回到在执行任何代码或DnD™之前检测到冲突之前的位置本身，因此使用有限。
This is a curious one, but incredibly useful.
异或很奇特，但非常有用。

tu.note: 备注：SourceControlGit_CloneNonBareOrigin：Message for when a clone is done on a non-bare repository but an origin has been found. 应该有更好的翻译。

tuv.seg: This is a non-bare repository which we do not support direct cloning from.\nHowever we have found its origin so we will push to that and clone from the origin instead.
这是一个非公开存储库，我们不支持从中直接克隆。\n但是，我们已经找到它的源点（origin），所以我们将推送到那并从源点克隆。

This is a non-bare repository which we do not support direct cloning from.\nThere is no Origin marked on this repository so we will ask you to create one so both old and new repositories will be linked via the new bare repository
这不是一个公开库，不支持直接克隆。\n这个库里也没有源点(origin)标记，所以我们要求你创建一个，旧的和新的库都将链接到这个新的公开库。
This is a positive value from 0 - 65,535.
This is a very important thing to remember as instances and objects are <i1>not the same thing</i1> and each have their own set of functions that can affect them.
这很重要，因为这意味着物体和实例 <i3>不</i3> 同，每一个实例均有自己的一套功能。
This is actually pretty useful, as we can now set up CONSTANTS for bit numbers.<br0>
实际上这相当有用，现在我们就可以建立比特常数（Bit Numbers）。<br0>
This is actually really useful, because when dividing down if we need the remainder, there's an even easier way to get it, which we'll get to in a moment.
实际上，这很有用，因为当我们向下除的时候如果我们需要余数，我们就可以更容易地获取它，我们一会会去获取它。
This is all laid out in an intuitive fashion, with different aspects of your game "<b3>chaining</b3>" together in the IDE to give you a unique and very visual representation of the workflow.
使用直观时尚的布置，在IDE中将你游戏的不同方面"<b3>链接</b3>"在一起，给你一个独特并且直观、可视化的工作流。
This is an invaluable tool for deciding whether to update your current version, or when you find something that may be a bug after a release.
当你要更新你当前版本的时候这是个至关重要的工具，否则你可能会在下一个版本中就看到一些可能是bug的东西。
This is because 5 is 00000101 in binary, and following the rule above, the variable "flags" will get both these 2 bits merged with its own.
因为5在二进制中表示为00000101，而根据上述的规则，变量"flags"就会将这两个位合并进来。
This is checked by default and represents the initial "state" of the fixture at the start of the room it has been placed in.
这是默认情况下检查的，它表示在其放置的房间开始处的灯具的初始“状态”。
This is checked by default and unchecking it will mean that you have to manually open all newly created resources.
该选项默认被勾选，解除勾选该项意味着你需要手动打开所有新创建的资源。
This is done by clicking the "Parent" button in the object editor and then choosing another object from the resource tree to be the "parent" of the one being edited:
这可以通过单击对象编辑器中的“父”按钮，然后从资源树中选择另一个对象作为正在编辑的对象的“父”：

This is due to optimisation differences between the different target platforms, for example on the Windows target functions may be evaluated from right to left, but on the HTML5 target, they may be evaluated from left to right.
这是不同目标平台之间的优化差异导致的，比如说在Windows目标平台上函数是从右到左求值的，而在HTML5平台上则是从左到右的。
This is extremely useful to keep your game structured and you are strongly advised to learn to use this mechanism.
这对于保持游戏结构非常有用，并且强烈建议您学习使用此机制。
This is great news of course, since it means that you no longer have to optimise every line of code you write, but if this is the case - should you really care about binary at all?
这当然是好消息，因为这意味着你不再需要优化你写的每一行代码，如果真是这样 - 你还会真正关心二进制吗？
This is great, but if we had to work this out every time we needed to clear flags, it would become tiresome.
这是很不错的思路，但每次我们需要清除标志时，如果不得不解决这个问题，这样会变得非常烦琐。

This is handy for when you have, for example, a main character that moves from room to room and you want to maintain the variables within that object the same, but you should take great care to create and destroy persistent objects correctly as you can easily get errors creeping into your project by mistake.
当你有一个主角从一个房间移动到另一个房间，并且你想保持该对象中的变量是一样的时候，这是方便的，但你应该非常小心地创建和销毁持久性对象正确，因为你可以轻松错误地让您的项目出现错误。
This is how you will reference it in code.
这是您在代码中引用它的方式。
This is off by default, and enabling it will mean that everytime you load and run any project the cache will need to be rebuilt (which can take time depending on the size of the game).
该选项默认为关，启用此项意味着每次你载入并运行工程时需要重新创建缓存（取决于游戏的大小，这可能会花一些时间）。
This is on by default and is the recommended configuration since large compiler logs can slow down compile times.
该选项默认为开，并且这也是推荐选项，因为过多的编译器日志会拖慢编译时间。
This is on by default, and switching it off will force the help file to open in workspace within the IDE.
该选项默认为开，关闭该选项则会强制帮助文件在IDE的工作区内打开。
This is small tools primary function is to connect to and serve files to some of the available target platforms for <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> (like the HTML5 target, for example).
微型网络服务器(Micro Web Server,MWS)是一个主要用于连接<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>可用的目标平台（如HTML5平台）及向目标平台添加伺服文件的小工具。
This is the "pure" colour tone which is part of the hue, saturation and value (luminosity) method for defining a colour.
色相是一个“纯粹”的色调颜色，它是色彩的三元素（H-色调、S-饱和度、V-明度）之一。
This is the position within the array that we are checking or changing.
这是数组内我们所检查或修改的位置。
This is true of <i0>all</i0> binary numbers, and how the computer makes up any number internally.
这适用于 <i0>所有的</i0> 二进制数，包括计算机内部构成的任何数字。
This is very important to ensure the correct behaviour of your games across all the target platforms games and is <i0>essential</i0> for JavaScript platforms.
这在确保各平台行为正确性<i0>特别是</i0>JavaScript平台的时候是非常重要的。
This link cannot be opened as you are currently offline.
你当前处于离线状态，因此无法打开此链接。
This makes life pretty simple in terms of clearing flags.<br0>
就清除标志来说，这变得相当简单。<br0>
This marks the current runtime that has been selected for use when building your projects.
这个标记当前构建项目所选中并使用的运行库。
This mask keeps all bits currently set, but clears the two bits we actually want cleared.
这个掩码保留当前所有设置的位，但是清除我们想要清除的那两个位。
This may look like a lot of code, but if these numbers are constants, the compiler will pre-compile these operations into a single value so that we end up with this as actual code.
这样代码可能看起来有点多，但是如果这些数是常数，那么编译器可以预编译这些指令成为单个值，使得我们最终实际代码是这样的：
This may require updating scripts where depth values have been used.
这可能需要更新已使用深度值的脚本。

This means that if you place a persistent object in one room, it will still be available in all subsequent rooms and will continue to perform any actions assigned to the events in its object properties, <i1>except</i1> the create event, which is only fired once when it is created initially and not when you change to a new room.
这意味着如果将永久对象放在一个房间中，它仍然可以在所有后续房间中使用，并将继续执行分配给其对象属性<i1>中的事件的任何操作，</i1>创建事件，这只是在最初创建时才被触发一次，而不是当您更改为新房间时才被触发。
This means that there is no longer a "background" resource, and it also means that the following functions are obsolete:
这也就意味着不再有“背景”资源了，并且这也意味着下述函数被弃用了：
This menu is for opening the general docked IDE windows.
该惨淡用于打开常用的IDE停靠窗口。
This menu is related to getting help when using <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>.
该菜单是有关在使用<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>期间获得帮助的内容。
This menu is related to saving and loading different IDE layouts.
该菜单是关于保存载入不同IDE布局的。
This menu permits you to open the various stand alone tools that are available to you within <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>, with the following options:
该菜单允许你在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中打开各种可用的独立工具，具有如下选项：
This method allows is to store objects, collisions, flags – all manner of things, and access them very quickly.
允许使用的方法有存储物体、碰撞、标记——等各种东西，并快速地访问它们。

This name should never contain spaces nor unauthorized characters (only alpha-numeric characters and the underbar "_" are allowed) and should be short but memorable so that you can easily identify resources later when you may have many of them.
该名称不应包含空格或未授权的字符（只允许使用字母数字字符和下划线“_”），并且应该简短但难忘，以便稍后在可能有许多文件时可以轻松识别资源。

tuv.seg: This operator makes removing flags very simple, and better yet, it's usually a compile time optimisation meaning if you're using a constant number (i.e. not a variable) then the compiler will flip the bits automatically for you.
这个运算符让删除标志非常简单，而且更好，这通常是一个编译时间上的优化。如果你使用一个常数值（即不是变量），然后编译器将为你自动翻转“位”。
This option is checked by default.
This option is off by default.
This option is set to "Show Message" by default.
该选项默认为“显示消息”
This option is unchecked by default.
This option permits you to set the detection speed, with a default value of 350ms.
该选项允许你设置慢双击的侦测速度，默认值为350毫秒
This option permits you to set the first of those colours to use (inlcuding alpha), and has a default value of <t1>#FFFFFD0</t1>.
该选项允许你选择这两种所用颜色的第一种颜色（包括透明度），默认值为<t1>#FFFFFD0</t1>。
This option permits you to set the second of those colours to use (inlcuding alpha), and has a default value of <t1>#0000D0</t1>.
该选项允许你选择这两种所用颜色的第二种颜色（包括透明度），默认值为<t1>#0000D0</t1>。
This page is going to explain a bit about what binary is as well as how it can be used when making your games.
此页要解释一下，什么是二进制，以及如何在制作游戏时使用它们。

This permits you to set <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> to suit to your workflow and with the options in this menu you can save out the current project layouts as an <t1>*.xml</t1> file which can then be loaded into any project to set the layouts to be the same.
这就允许你去设置<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>来适应你的工作流程，而使用该菜单中的选项你可以保存当前项目的布局为一个<t1>*.xml</t1>文件，这个文件还可以被载入到任意一个项目当中来把IDE设置为同样的布局。
This project is located in an unsafe location: {0}\nPlease save it in a new location to avoid loss of work.
该项目位于不安全的位置：{0}\n请将其保存到新位置，避免工作损失。
This project may have been moved or deleted.\nPlease verify the project location and try again.
这个项目可能已被移动或删除。\n请确认项目的位置，然后再试一次。

This section deals with the dialogs that may be be shown while using the Object Editor, with the following option available:
这一部分是使用物体编辑器时可能会显示的对话框，有下面可用的选项：
This section deals with the different scripting languages available to you for programming in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>.
这一章节讨论<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>向你提供的用于编程的不同的脚本语言。
This section deals with the preferences that you are required to set to get the <b0>Git SCM</b0> plugin to work with <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
本节讨论要求让 <b0>Git SCM</b0>在<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>上能够使用的偏好设置。
This section details all the available runtimes, the version number, the date it was released, and, if it is installed, the path to where it has been installed to.
这部分列出所有可用运行库的细节，版本号、发布的日期以及如果安装的话，它所安装的路径。
This section gives the few functions available for getting information about <a0>arrays</a0>:
这一部分给出了一些可以用来获取关于<a0>数组（Arrays）</a0>信息的函数。
This section is the obligatory first stop for using <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> and getting to grips with how things work.
这一章节是<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>使用的必然的第一站， 需要掌握它工作的方式。
This section lists the different menus available to you from the top bar of the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE:
这一部分列出了不同的可用的菜单，它们在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE的顶部栏：

This section will show the Master runtime feed URL by default, but you can click the <i0>Add</i0> button to create a new Runtime Feed where you give the name and the URL for the RSS feed, and then click <i1>Apply</i1> to tell <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> to access it.
默认此部分将显示主要的运行库下载源地址，但是你可以点击<i0>添加</i0>按钮创建一个新的运行库下载源，你可以在其它给出RSS源的名称和网址，然后点击<i1>应用</i1>告知<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 访问它。
This setting controls how far you have to drag the tab before the workspace recognises it, and the default value is 4px.
该选项控制着在工作区识别出该操作之前你需要将标签页拖拽出多远，默认值为4px。
This setting is on by default, and un-checking it will switch it off (meaning that you will have to manually remove any temp files later).
该选项默认为开，解除勾选此项会将其关闭（意味着你需要在以后手动地删除所有的临时文件）。
This setting sets the number of milliseconds to have to wait with the mouse button pressed before the node can be moved (not repositioned).
这个设定设置了在节点能够被移动之前需要等待鼠标按下的毫秒数（不重置）。
This setting will affect how much an object "bounces" when it collides with other objects and is co-dependant on other forces that act on the instance like gravity and friction.
此设置将影响对象在与其他对象碰撞时“弹跳”多少，并且与重力和摩擦力作用于实例上的其他力相配合。
This setting will be used to define the maximum permitted size (default 64px).
这项设定将被用于定义允许的最大尺寸（默认为64像素）。
This setting will be used to define the minimum permitted size (default 16px).
这项设定将被用于定义允许的最小尺寸（默认为16像素。）
This sharing is called "inheritance" and an object that has a parent is called a "child" object.
这种共享称为“继承”，具有父类的对象称为“子”对象。
This sprite is a tile set and resizing will cause tile data to change.
这个精灵是一个图块集，重定义大小将导致图块数据变化。
This sprite is used by multiple tile sets of varying tile sizes.
这个精灵被不同大小的多个图块集所使用。
This starts the game again after it has been paused
在游戏被暂停后再次开始游戏
This time line has no moments with source code
该时间轴没有带有源代码的时刻

此变量已从父物体{0}继承。

这个属性默认是<i0>开着的</i0>但是你也可以根据你的喜好把这个按钮切换为关闭状态。

这会关闭调试器并永久丢弃所有已收集的数据。
This will close the game and the debugger and permanently discard all collected data.
这会关闭游戏并永久丢弃所有已收集的数据。
This will create a bare (server) repository and bind your project to it
这将创建一个公开（服务器）存储库并将项目绑定到它
This will create a new DnD™ script and open the editor window: <i2>
就会创建一个新的DnD™脚本并打开编辑器窗口：

这段代码会新建一个粒子发射器并将其索引存入变量“p_emit”中。

This will have a direct impact on how much inertia a fixture has as well as how it reacts to collisions and forces, so if you make a small shape with a high density it will have a very large mass (like a bar of lead), but if you define a large shape with a low density it will have a much smaller mass (like a balloon).
这将直接影响夹具具有多少惯性以及如何对碰撞和力产生反应，因此，如果您制造出高密度的小形状，则会产生非常大的质量（如铅棒）但是如果您定义了一个较小密度的大形状，那么它的质量会更小（像一个气球）。
This will lose any unapplied changes you have made - do you want to continue?
这将会丢失所有未应用的更改 - 你想要继续吗？
This will open the window pictured at the top of this page with the following sections:
这将打开此页面顶部的窗口，具有以下部分：
This will prompt you to choose another event category and once selected the contents of the current event will be changed to the new event (removing the original event in the process).
这将提示您选择另一个事件类别，一旦选择了当前事件的内容将被更改为新事件（删除过程中的原始事件）。
This will re-open any windows that are related to a tutorial project you have opened, but only if the project is one that was created as part of a tutorial (if not, this option will be unavailable).
该选项将会重新打开任何与你所打开的教程项目有关的窗口，但是，前提是该项目必须已经创建为教程的一部分（否则该选项不可用）。
This will set the active drawing font to fnt_Main if it exists.
这段代码在fnt_Main字体存在时将其设置为活动字体。
This will take the contents of the chosen event and duplicate them in another event that you specify.
这将取代所选事件的内容，并在您指定的另一个事件中复制它们。
This wizard helps you easily create a layout for your DnD™ action.
该向导可帮助您轻松为DnD™动作创建布局。

在El Capitan的苹果应用商店（Mac App Store）外面发布你的游戏需要数字签名。

To download any of the Official tutorials or demos, simply click on the icon for the one you wish to go through and it will added to your "<b0>Owned</b0>" section at the top (note that you may be required to login to the Marketplace before this can be done).

To ease you into things we have created a handy <a4>Quick Start Guide</a4>, and even if you are familiar with other game creation tools we recommend that you start there to get an overview of the way that <i5>GameMaker Studio 2</i5> works.

单个二进制数只能存储 0 或 1，只能这样，所以复杂的数字需要添加位数。

这里就该让位与（位且，Binary AND）运算符登场了。
Well, as bit 5 is 32, then all the bits below would be 31, and that's the maximum remainder so that's what we AND with (we could also use ((1<<5)-1) which would make 32-1 = 31.
因为5号位是32，其下所有的位就是31，这也是可能的最大余数，因此这就是我们使用位与运算的对象（我们也可以这样用((1<<5)-1），会使得32-1 = 31
Well, here are just a few things that would be impossible without arrays -
有些东西不用数组实现不了——
Well, in order to divide by 32, we have to execute a floating point divide – which obviously takes time, but in order to do the mod 32, you actually have to do another one!
为了除以32，我们必须执行一次浮点数触发——显然，这很花费时间，但是为了和对32取余数，你实际上还需要再做一次！
Well, it merges all the bits together into a single value, like this:
事实上，它将所有的位融合在一起，成为一个单独的值，像这样：

嗯，你想将 <t0>真</t0> 或者 <t1>假</t1>作为一个值储存。
Well, when an object has a parent assigned it can share code, actions and events with that parent.
那么当一个对象分配了一个父类时，它可以与该父进程共享代码，动作和事件。

What this does, is first time through is 0 ^ 1 = 1, then the second time 1 ^ 1 = 0, thereby toggling things back and forth from 0 to 1.<br0>
这样做，第一次的时候（a=0）是 0 ^ 1 = 1，然后第二次（a=1）是1 ^ 1 = 0，从而触发从0到1再到0的来回。<br0>
What this means is that the order in which you place functions in your code will change from platform to platform, so you should code them in an explicit manner.
这也就意味着在你的代码中函数的顺序会依照平台的不同而发生变化，因此你需要以一种显式的方式来进行编写。

What this means is that you can "pick and choose" which compiler version and which runner version to use should you have found any issues with the current one or are aiming at a very specific target version or platform.
而这就意味着当你发现当前的编译器和运行器对某一个目标版本或平台有问题的时候，你可以“挑选”编译器和运行器的版本。
What this means, is that just as you are able to <i0>set</i0> multiple flags at once, you can also <i1>clear</i1> multiple flags at once.

我们需要的是一种比较容易翻转“位”的方法（最好没有CPU开销）。

While <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> is a powerful tool, it cannot do everything for you at the touch of a button so start small with simple examples and you will realize that not only is creating games great fun, but that learning to use <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> to do it is also very rewarding!
而 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>是一个强大的工具，在能随心所欲的制作游戏之前，我们先从一些简单的小例子开始。你就会明白，制作游戏是一件很有趣的事情， 而且学习使用 <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> 也是非常值得的！

While it's true you can still get some speed ups - and sometimes these can be significant - using binary and hex leads to you knowing the CPU better and can also lead to writing better code, being able to pack data better, and making some tasks a lot simpler.
虽然这是事实，你仍然可以得到一些速度上的提升 - 而有时这些提升可以更加显著 - 使用二进制和十六进制可以让CPU运行得更快，也能写出更好的代码，以及更好的打包数据，让一些任务变得简单得多，这些你应该都是知道的。
While we finish up your installation...
当我们完成您的安装时...

With a sprite assigned to the object you can click the Edit Sprite button <i0> to change the sprite properties, or if you do not have a sprite for the object but wish to create one you can click the Add Sprite button <i1> to create a new sprite resource and assign that.

With the "normal" collision system your collisions are based off of the mask of the sprite assigned to the object, but with physics enabled this is no longer the case.
使用“正常”碰撞系统，您的碰撞是基于分配给对象的精灵的掩码，但是物理启用不再是这样。

With the advent of vertex buffers, matrices and cameras in <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>, the following functions have been made obsolete:
随着<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>中顶点缓冲区、矩阵以及摄像机系统的引进，下述函数已经作废：
With this function you can check to see if two arrays are equal (equivalent or the same).
使用该函数你可以检测两个数组是否相等（等价或一致）
With this function you can create an array of a given size.
使用该函数，你可以创建一个给定长度的数组。
With this function you can get the height (number of entries) of a the first dimension of a 2D array.
使用该函数你可以得到一个二维数组的高度（以数组元素的个数形式）。
With this function you can get the internal Windows id value (the HWND, a <i0>pointer</i0>).
使用该函数您能获取到内部Windows内部id值（HWND，一个<i0>指针</i0>）。
With this function you can get the length (number of entries) of a 1D array.
使用该函数你可以得到一个一维数组的长度（以数组元素的个数形式）。
With this function you can get the length (number of entries) of a the second dimension of an array.
使用该函数你可以得到一个二维数组的高度（以数组元素的个数形式）。
With this function you can get the value from a given named global variable.
使用该函数你可以从所给定全局变量名的变量中的值。
With this function you can get the x position of the mouse cursor (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
使用该函数您可以获取到鼠标光标在显示器上（Windows、Ubuntu(Linux)及MacOS平台）的x坐标（像素为单位），如果是HTML5平台则是在浏览器中的位置。
With this function you can get the y position of the mouse cursor (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
使用该函数您可以获取到鼠标光标在显示器上（Windows、Ubuntu(Linux)及MacOS平台）的y坐标（像素为单位），如果是HTML5平台则是在浏览器中的位置。
With this function you can poll the window (or tab) state and if it loses focus the function will return <t0>false</t0> otherwise it will return <t1>true</t1>.
使用这个函数您能够得到窗口（或标签页）的状态，如果它失焦的时候，该函数会返回<t0>false</t0>，反之则返回<t1>true</t1>。
With this function you can send a request to connect to a server.
您能够使用该函数发送一个连接服务器的请求。
With this option you can choose to have the message show, have it update the layers as if you'd clicked "Ok", or have it not update anything as if you'd clicked "No".
使用这个选项你可以选择显示消息，如果单击“Ok（确定）”它会更新层，单击“No（否）”将不会自动更新。
With this option you can convert from one to the other, regardless of the project type.
使用此选项，无论项目类型如何，都可以将其从一个转换为另一个。
With those details given you can then click on the <b0>Create Certificate</b0> button to generate the <t1>*.pem</t1> file.

You are presented with a list of everything and as you type the search term, this list will be culled to suit, so if all your rooms are prefixed with "rm_" for example, typing that will cull the resource list to show <i2>only</i2> those resources that begin with that name.
你会看到一个列举了全部东西的列表，并且随着你键入搜索项，该列表就会进行适配筛选，所以如果你的所有房间的名称都用"rm_"前缀，键入"rm_"就会筛选资源列表并<i2>仅</i2>显示以这个名字开头的资源。
You assign the array to a variable, and then "fill in" different indices of the array with values.
你可以将数组赋予给一个变量，然后用值“填入”数组的各个索引元素中。

你<i0>不</i0>可以编辑此处的大部分信息（因为它们是通过<a1>目标管理器设备（Target Manager Devices）</a1>被设定好的，但是你可以修改<b2>网络速度（Network Speed）</b2>值）。

你也可以在制作过程中将值赋给枚举变量：

您还可以通过单击编辑图像按钮<i2>来编辑已分配的精灵资源图像以打开图像编辑器。
You can also update the runtime list at any time from the given RSS feed clicking the refresh button <i0>.
你也可以在任何时间通过点击刷新按钮更新运行库列表。<i0>.

你也可以使用快捷键<i1> + 鼠标滚轮 <i2>缩放工作区。
You can choose either "Frames per second" or "Frames per game frame", with the default setting being "Frames per second".
你可以选择“帧每秒”或者“帧每游戏帧”，默认设置是“帧每秒”。
You can choose to let the IDE decide by selecting <i1>Use Default</i1>, or you can force it <i2>On</i2> or <i3>Off</i3> by selecting either of those options.
你可以选择<i1>使用默认（Use Default）</i1>来让IDE决定，也可以通过选择相应选项来强制它<i2>开启（On）</i2>或<i3>关闭（Off）</i3>。

You can click <b0>New</b0> to create a new project, <b1>Open</b1> to open an existing project or <b2>Import</b2> to open a <a3>GameMaker: Studio 1.4</a3> <t4>GMX</t4> project file or to open a compressed <t5>YYZ</t5> <i6>GameMaker Studio 2</i6> project file.
你可以点击 <b0>新建（New）</b0> 创建一个新的工程，<b1>打开（Open）</b1> 来打开一个外部工程或者 <b2>导入（Import）</b2> 打开一个 <a3>GameMaker: Studio 1.4</a3>的<t4>GMX</t4> 工程文件，或者打开压缩的 <t5>YYZ</t5>格式的<i6>GameMaker Studio 2</i6> 工程文件。
You can click the colour swatch to open the colour editor and change it.
你可以点击颜色卡来打开颜色编辑器去改变它。

您可点击鼠标中键You can click the middle mouse button <i0> or press <i1> on any of the scripts listed in the report to open it and see what has been done.

任何事件都可以单击鼠标右键<i0>获取以下菜单选项：<i1>
You can create multiple notes and name them from the right mouse button <i1> menu in the resource tree.
你可以右键<i1>资源树菜单来创建多个便签并为其命名。

You can directly access these built in argument variables, or you can assign them to temporary (local) variables as we have done in the example above (using temporary variables makes it easier to follow what each one does, and is recommended).
你可以直接访问这些内置的argument变量，或者将其赋给临时（局部）变量就像我们在上面范例中所做的那样（使用临时变量会使跟踪每一个参数的行为更加容易，并且这是推荐的做法）。
You can disable them here, and they are on by default.
你可以在此处禁用他们，它们默认是打开的。

你可以通过下面的链接查看当前的运行环境发行信息
You can get the number of entries for the second dimension of the array using the function <a0><t1>array_length_2d</t1></a0>.
你可以使用函数<a0><t1>array_length_2d</t1></a0>来得到数组的第二个维度元素个数。

你可以从<a4>文件菜单</a4>中登出。

您不能将全局输入绑定到带参数的函数上。

您现在可以编辑代码，为您的对象提供特定的行为或对该事件的反应。

你只能同时打开一个ini文件。

你可以通过IDE顶端的<i1>文件（File）</i1>菜单来打开<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>的偏好设置：

You can perform certain operations on strings, like add two strings together to create a longer string (concatenation) and you can also change the string properties and even extract real numbers from it.
你可以对字符串执行某些操作，例如将它们叠加到一起形成一段更长的字符串（串接操作（Concatenation）），你也可以改变字符串的属性甚至从中抽取实数部分。

你可以通过点击刷新（Refresh）按钮来刷新设备列表。

You can set here whether to show this message, or have the IDE simply choose the "Yes" or "No" option.

You can setup the IDE however you wish, with certain elements (like the Resource Tree, or the Output Windows) arranged differently to the default.

You can still open the sprite editor by right clicking <i2> and selecting <i3>Open Properties</i3>.

在使用指针的时候，你可能会使用（或通过返回得到）如下的内置常量：

You must first enable the option and then set the value (the default value is 96), and once changed you will be prompted to restart the IDE, which may require you to save any work being done on the currently open project.
你必须先启用该选项然后去设置它的值（默认值为96），并且一旦你应用了修改，你就会被提示去重启IDE，而这就可能要求你保存当前打开的工程的所有工作。
You must first open a project to import resources into
您必须先打开一个项目才能将资源导入

你必须添加至少一个资源

你必须指定 VCVARS32.BAT 文件的完整路径
You need to commit changes before pulling.
在拉取之前你需要提交更改。
You should also note that you can <b0>name events</b0>, or at least give them a short descriptive text that will be shown beside them in the Event Editor.
您还应该注意，您可以<b0>名称事件</b0>，或至少给他们一个简短的描述性文本，将在事件编辑器旁边显示。

你也应该意识到，父母也可以有父母！
You should permit the web server to communicate through the firewall if this happens.
如果发生这种情况，你应该允许网络服务器穿过防火墙进行通信。
You supply the array to check and the output from the function tells you how many initial entries it contains.
你需要提供待检测的数组，然后函数的输出将会告诉你它包含多少初始元素。

You supply the entry number for the first dimension and the function will return the number of second dimension entries that the array has (to find the length of the first dimension use the function <a0><t1>array_height_2D</t1></a0>).
你需要提供数组第一个维度的元素索引，然后函数会返回你在该元素下数组的长度（如果要获得数组的第一个维度请使用函数<a0><t1>array_height_2d</t1></a0>）。
You supply the name of the global variable to get the value of <i0>as a string</i0> (see example code below) and the function will return the value held by the global variable.
你需要提供待取得值的全局变量的<i0>字符串形式的</i0>名称（见下方代码），然后这个函数就会返回该全局变量所承载的值。
You tell the function the length of the array to create, and it will return the "handle" for the array which you can then assign to a variable.
你需要告诉这个函数所要创建的数组长度，然后它会返回给你这个数组的“句柄”，你可以将这个句柄赋给一个变量。
You then drag the object into a room in the <a1>Room Editor</a1> to create an <b2>instance</b2> copied from the basic object template.
然后，将对象拖动到<a1>房间编辑器</ a1>中的房间，以创建从基本对象模板复制的<b2>实例</b2>。
You will be prompted to give a save location and a name for the file, and you should take note of this for future reference.
系统会提示你要保存的位置和文件的名称，你应该注意这个以备将来参考。
You will need to <a2>log in again</a2> with the same licence (or any other) to be able to use the product later.
注销后您将需要使用同一个（或者其他有效的）帐户<a2>再次登录</a2>才能继续使用本产品。
You will need to close and re-open the Preferences window for the new feed to be shown.
你将需要关闭并重新打开偏好设置窗口，以显示新的下载源。
You will need to set up a signing certificate before you can create and publish packages.
在创建和发布程序包之前，你将需要设置一个签名证书。
You'll find <i6>GameMaker Studio 2</i6> to be easy and intuitive to use and that, whatever your skill level, you will soon be making those games you've always dreamed of.
你会发现，<i6>GameMaker Studio 2</i6>简单直观并于易于使用，不论你的技能等级，你将很快可以制作你梦寐以求的那些游戏。

You'll find that <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> is intuitive and simple to use, and even if you've never used any tools like this before you shouldn't have any problems getting started and making games after reading through this section.
你会发现，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>是直观且易用的，即使你以前没有使用过类似的工具。读过这一章节之后，入门以及开始制作游戏应该不会有任何困难。
You'll find the IDE is also incredibly flexible, and it can be customised to your needs - should the default IDE setup not cover something you require - through the use of the <b0>Plugin</b0> system.
你也将发现这个IDE拥有不可思议的灵话性，它可以根据你的需要进行定制 - 默认的IDE设置不覆盖你要求的东西 - 通过 <b0>插件</b0>系统的使用。

<b0>Control key must be held down for mouse wheel zoom</b0>: When this is checked all editors (and the main workspace) will have zoom enabled with <i1> + the mouse wheel <i2>, while un-checking it will enable zoom with <i3>only</i3> the mouse wheel <i4>.
You can choose to let the IDE decide by selecting <i1>Use Default</i1>, or you can force it <i2>On</i2> or <i3>Off</i3> by selecting either of those options.

When you want to draw text in your game this text will be drawn in a standard Arial 12 points font by default, but to make more interesting or unique looking texts you will probably want to use different fonts.

Shaders are a very powerful tool that can be used to manipulate the graphics that your game renders to the screen, permitting incredibly fast effects that can range from, for example, adding a subtle colour hue to a sprite, right up to full screen distortion effects.

As with the compiler errors, the syntax errors window will direct you to the object, the event and the specific lines that are giving the issue, and will often be shown with a brief explanation of what the error is.
